1a1('bum): / 'bum ga pa bzhugs so//
1b1('bum): @#// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ glegs bam gsum pa/ bam po dang po// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de shes rab
1b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid
1b3('bum): kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched
1b4('bum): drug phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong ba nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
1b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang la/
2a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid
2a2('bum): la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye
2a3('bum): mched drug chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
2a4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
2a5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
2a6('bum): byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa
2b1('bum): nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
2b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug
2b3('bum): thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog pa dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
2b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ ba'i tshul gyis dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
2b5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
2b6('bum): su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyi chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang
2b7('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul
3a1('bum): gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skyes mched drug pa
3a2('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis ba stong pa nyid kyang la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
3a3('bum): par/ skye mched drug dngos po'i pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po'i pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
3a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
3a5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye mched drug dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la// stong pa nyid kyis
3a6('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
3a7('bum): byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg pa phyi stong pa
3b1('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg pa phyi
3b2('bum): nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
3b3('bum): par/ reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
3b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
3b5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par// reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
3b6('bum): su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang
3b7('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i
4a1('bum): tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg pa mtha' las
4a2('bum): 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
4a3('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
4a4('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg pa dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
4a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par// reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
4a6('bum): sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg pa thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid
4a7('bum): kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i
4b1('bum): tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg pa pa stong pa zhes bya
4b2('bum): bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/
4b3('bum): reg pa dngos po pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
4b4('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg pa ngo po pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
4b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ reg pa dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab
4b6('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis
4b7('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
5a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba phyi nang
5a2('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/
5a3('bum): tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
5a4('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
5a5('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba don dam stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis don dam stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
5a6('bum): do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang
5a7('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i
5b1('bum): tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong
5b2('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
5b3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
5b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid
5b5('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis
5b6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar
5b7('bum): yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
6a1('bum): par/ tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
6a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
6a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba dngos po pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
6a4('bum): byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid
6a5('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis
6a6('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
6a7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sred pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
6b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sred pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
6b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang yid la bya ba par/ sred pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
6b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yid la bya ba par/ sred pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
6b4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yid la bya ba par/ sred pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
6b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sred pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
6b6('bum): su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba bar/ sred pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang la/
6b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sred pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus
7a1('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sred pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar
7a2('bum): yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldang pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sred
7a3('bum): ba thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dag tham pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
7a4('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sred pa dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dor ba ba stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam
7a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sred pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
7a6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sred pa chos thams cad stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
7a7('bum): do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sred pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/
7b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sred pa pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis
7b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sred pa dngos po pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
7b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba bar/ sred pa ngo bo
7b4('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
7b5('bum): ba par/ sred pa dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
7b6('bum): dpa' chen po/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ len pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis
7b7('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ len pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong
8a1('bum): ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ len pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi
8a2('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ len pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
8a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ len pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid
8a4('bum): la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ len pa don dam
8a5('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab phyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
8a6('bum): par/ len pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dbyings la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
8a7('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ len pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
8b1('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ len pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de
8b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ len pa thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid
8b3('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ len pa dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang
8b4('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ len pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa
8b5('bum): nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ len pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul
8b6('bum): gyi chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ len ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
8b7('bum): yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ len ba
9a1('bum): dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
9a2('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba par/ len pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
9a3('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ len pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
9a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ len pa dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid dang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor
9a5('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ srid pa nang stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang
9a6('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ srid pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi
9a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ srid pa phyin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
9b1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ srid pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
9b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ srid pa chen po stong ba zhes bya bar
9b3('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa don
9b4('bum): dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
9b5('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa 'dus byas stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
9b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ srid pa 'dus ma byas stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
9b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ srid pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
10a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ srid pa thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
10a2('bum): de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tham pa stong pa nyid kyang la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ srid pa dor ba
10a3('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
10a4('bum): yid la bya ba par srid pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
10a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ srid pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
10a6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ srid pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
10a7('bum): su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ srid pa pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis pa stong pa nyid kyang
10b1('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ srid pa dngos po pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul
10b2('bum): gyis dang po pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ srid pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
10b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ srid pa dngos po pa'i ngo bo
10b4('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de shes rab kyi pha rol
10b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
10b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye ba phyi stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
10b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
11a1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
11a2('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang la/
11a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong
11a4('bum): pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
11a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye ba 'dus ma byas
11a6('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
11a7('bum): la bya ba par/ skye ba mtha' las 'das pa byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
11b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye ba thog ma dang tha ma pa stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tham pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
11b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye ba dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
11b3('bum): sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang la/
11b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chos thams
11b5('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
11b6('bum): byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/
11b7('bum): skye ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
12a1('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye ba dngos po pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
12a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
12a3('bum): su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ skye ba dngos po pa'i ngo bo'i nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos bo pa'i ngo bo
12a4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
12a5('bum): par/ rga shi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
12a6('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rga shi phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
12a7('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rga shi phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
12b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rga shi stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
12b2('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rga shi chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
12b3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rga shi don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
12b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rga shi 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
12b5('bum): byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rga shi 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa
12b6('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rga shi mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las
12b7('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rga shi thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
13a1('bum): byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/
13a2('bum): rga shi dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
13a3('bum): yid la bya ba par/ rga shi rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
13a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rga shi chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
13a5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rga shi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis
13a6('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rga shi pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis pa stong
13a7('bum): pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rga shi dngos po pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
13b1('bum): byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rga shi ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
13b2('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/
13b3('bum): rga shi dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
13b4('bum): chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang la/
13b5('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis
13b6('bum): yang dag par spong ba de dag kyang la/ yang dag par spong ba de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
13b7('bum): sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag kyang la/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
14a1('bum): par/ dbang po rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis dbang po de dag kyang la/ dbang po de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
14a2('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ stobs rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis stobs de dag kyang la/ stobs de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
14a3('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag de dag kyang la/ byang chub kyi yan lag de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
14a4('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag kyang la/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
14a5('bum): brgyad pa de dag gis rkyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden
14a6('bum): pa de dag kyang la/ 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ bsam gtan rnams sgom ste/
14a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan de dag kyang la/ bsam gtan de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshad pa
14b1('bum): rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis tshad pa de dag kyang la/ tshad pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gzugs pa'i snyoms
14b2('bum): par 'jug pa rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang la/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
14b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par thar pa rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa de dag kyang la/ rnam par thar pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
14b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom ste pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang la/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
14b5('bum): 'jug pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa sgom ste/
14b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa de dag kyang la/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de
14b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ mngon par shes pa rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa de dag kyang la/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis kyang
15a1('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang
15a2('bum): la/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo de dag
15a3('bum): kyang la/ gzungs kyi sgo de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom ste/
15a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag kyang la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
15a5('bum): bya ba par/ 'jigs pa rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis 'jigs pa de dag kyang la/ 'jigs pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
15a6('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa de dag kyang la/ so so yang dag par rig pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
15a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ snying rje chen po sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po de yang la snying rje chen po des kyang rlom sems su byed do// de
15b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom ste/ pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag kyang la/ sangs
15b2('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gnyis pa// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
15b3('bum): po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar thabs mkhas pas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing sngang la skrag par 'gyur ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
15b4('bum): dpa' chen po/ sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing sngang la skrag par 'gyur te/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par ltung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
15b5('bum): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par
15b6('bum): byed pa'o/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa par byed
15b7('bum): cing zlog par byed pa'o/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa par byed cing zlog par byed pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin/ 'di ni chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyis/ 'di la bslab par bya ba'i
16a1('bum): cha'o/ / mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa ste/ 'di dag ni mnyan par bya'o// gzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// klag par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// 'di dag ni gzhan la
16a2('bum): bstan par bya'o zhes zer ba 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig to can/
16a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug las zlog cing mos pa par byed de/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan gyi
16a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin
16a5('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ zhes zer ba 'ong ngo zhes bdud kyi las ston/ bdud kyi nyes pa ston pa 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan
16a6('bum): yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa
16a7('bum): dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la phab pa bstan pa dag ston to// 'grel to rnam par 'byed do// gsal bar byed do//
16b1('bum): yongs su ston to// zhes bdud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu dag smra ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag/ sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub
16b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni/ byang chub kyi sems kyang kyang / khyod ni phyir ldog pa yang ma yin/ khyod kyis ni bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
16b3('bum): bar yang nus so/ / zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag smra ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag/ sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing /
16b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu/ gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'du shes ni bdag gam bdag gis
16b5('bum): stong ngo / / 'du byed ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sna ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lce ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus ni bdag gam bdag
16b6('bum): gis stong ngo / / yid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sgra ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dri ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ro ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // reg ni bdag gam bdag gis stong
16b7('bum): ngo / / chos ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lce'i rnam par shes pa
17a1('bum): ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus
17a2('bum): te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag
17a3('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo / / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
17a4('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sa'i khams ni bdag gam
17a5('bum): bdag gis stong ngo / / chu'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // me'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rlung gi khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // nam mkha'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa'i
17a6('bum): khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / / ma rig pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'du byed ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dang gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // skye
17a7('bum): mched drug ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / / reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sred pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // len pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // srid pa ni bdag gam
17b1('bum): bdag gis stong ngo / / skye ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rga shi ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // bzod pa'i
17b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag
17b3('bum): gis stong ngo / / nang stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // phyi stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // phyi nang stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // chen po stong pa nyid ni bdag gam
17b4('bum): bdag gis stong ngo / / don dam pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam
17b5('bum): bdag gis stong ngo / / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dor ba pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni bdag
17b6('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo / / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dngos po pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag
17b7('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo / / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yang dag par spong ba rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rdzu 'phrul
18a1('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / / dbang po rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i
18a2('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // bsam gtan rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // tshad pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gzugs med
18a3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / / rnam par thar pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
18a4('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mngon par shes pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ting nge 'dzin rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // de
18a5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / / 'jigs pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // snying rje chen po ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
18a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // de ltar bdag gam bdag gis stong na/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ yang ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag
18a7('bum): smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du
18b1('bum): phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu/ shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang // byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang do// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang do// nyan thos zhes bya ba
18b2('bum): yang do/ / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng dag kyang stong ste/ phyogs bcu kun kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa'
18b3('bum): dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong pas/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang / nyan thos zhes bya ba yang do// zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
18b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag nyan thos kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog
18b5('bum): cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'dems shing rjes su ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag smra ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud
18b6('bum): sdig to can dag mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las zlog cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog ste/ dran
18b7('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la sbyor ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / dbang po rnams la sbyor ba dang / stobs rnams la sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la sbyor ba dang / 'phags
19a1('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / bsam gtan rnams la sbyor ba dang / tshad pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba dang /
19a2('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa pa'i chos rnams la sbyor zhing / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar chos de dag yongs su bsgoms la/
19a3('bum): nyan thos kyis mngon du gyis shig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag smra ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o//
19a4('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag pha dang ma'i cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/
19a5('bum): khyod la ci zhig bya de'i don du ni bskal pa tshad grangs par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing rkang lag dang mgo gcad pa tshad pas/ nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/ gang la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
19a6('bum): bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig/ ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
19a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag/ dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ gzugs rtag ces bya bar pa'i tshul
19b1('bum): gyis ston pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang // dben zhes bya bar
19b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / tshor ba rtag ces bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang // tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya ba
19b3('bum): dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / 'du shes rtag ces bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang /
19b4('bum): stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / 'du
19b5('bum): byed sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rnam
19b6('bum): par shes pa rtag ces bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du
19b7('bum): bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa
20a1('bum): ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang /
20a2('bum): mtshan ma ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sna rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang /
20a3('bum): stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / lce rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya
20a4('bum): ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / lus rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal
20a5('bum): zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / yid rtag ces
20a6('bum): bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul
20a7('bum): gyis ston pa dang / gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba
20b1('bum): dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sgra mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon
20b2('bum): par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / dri mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya ba dang / smon pa
20b3('bum): ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / ro rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma
20b4('bum): ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / reg rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya
20b5('bum): ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / chos rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /
20b6('bum): bdag ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gi rnam par shes
20b7('bum): pa rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar
21a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa
21a2('bum): ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya
21a3('bum): ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag
21a4('bum): ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa
21a5('bum): rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar
21a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya ba dang / mngon
21a7('bum): par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang /
21b1('bum): mtshan ma ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya
21b2('bum): ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul kyis ston pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba
21b3('bum): dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis
21b4('bum): ston pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba
21b5('bum): ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya
21b6('bum): ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang /
21b7('bum): zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
22a1('bum): tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /
22a2('bum): dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya ba dang / smon pa
22a3('bum): ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba
22a4('bum): dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba dang /
22a5('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa
22a6('bum): dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba
22a7('bum): med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang /
22b1('bum): mtshan ma ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sa'i khams rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / zhi
22b2('bum): zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / chu'i khams rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /
22b3('bum): bdag ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / khams rtag ces bya
22b4('bum): ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar pa'i tshul
