55b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// rab
55b4('bum): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nang stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas
55b5('bum): do/ / phyi stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// phyi nang stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// chen po
55b6('bum): stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// 'dus ma byas
55b7('bum): stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas
56a1('bum): do/ / dor ba pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i
56a2('bum): gnas med do/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas
56a3('bum): do/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
56a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// yang dag par spong ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i
56a5('bum): gnas med do/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// dbang po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// stobs shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// byang chub kyi yan lag shin tu rnam
56a6('bum): par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang
56a7('bum): chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// bsam gtan shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// tshad pa shin tu rnam par
56b1('bum): dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do/ / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// rnam par thar pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa shin
56b2('bum): tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// mngon par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas
56b3('bum): do/ / ting nge 'dzin shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// gzungs kyi sgo shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang
56b4('bum): chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// 'jigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// so so yang dag
56b5('bum): par rig pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do/ / snying rje chen po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
56b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bdag pa'i phyir/ bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// rab
56b7('bum): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sems can pa'i phyir/ sems can shin tu rnam par dag
57a1('bum): pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ srog
57a2('bum): pa'i phyir/ srog shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste
57a3('bum): dper na/ gso ba med pa'i phyir/ gso ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do//
57a4('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu pa'i phyir/ skyes bu shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
57a5('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gang zag pa'i phyir/ gang zag shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
57a6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ shed can med pa'i phyir/ shed can shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
57a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ shed bdag med pa'i phyir/ shed bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rab 'byor
57b1('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ byed pa po pa'i phyir/ byed pa po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i
57b2('bum): gnas do/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshor ba po med pa'i phyir/ tshor ba po shin tu
57b3('bum): rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ shes pa po
57b4('bum): pa'i phyir/ shes pa po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ mthong ba po
57b5('bum): pa'i phyir/ mthong ba po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor
57b6('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'char ba'i tshe/ mun pa'i gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
57b7('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bskal pa'i 'bar ba'i tshe/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
58a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la tshul khrims
58a2('bum): ngan pa'i gnas do/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
58a3('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'khrug pa'i gnas do/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do//
58a4('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shes rab la/ shes rab 'chal pa'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
58a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba la rnam par ma grol ba 'i gnas do//
58a6('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
58a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa la rnam par ma grol ba'i ye shes ma gzigs pa'i gnas do/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
58b1('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do//
58b2('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gza' dang / skar ma dang / nor bu rin po che dang / glog gi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
58b3('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang
58b4('bum): chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
58b5('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
58b6('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
58b7('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
59a1('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi
59a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
59a3('bum): la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
59a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu spyod
59a5('bum): ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi 'og la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
59a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ snang ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
59a7('bum): sems dpa'i tshig gi don do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ chung snang gi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
59b1('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshad snang ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
59b2('bum): tshig gi don do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ kun snang dag ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
59b3('bum): tshig gi don do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dge ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig
59b4('bum): gi don do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ chung dge'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig
59b5('bum): gi don do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshad dge ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig
59b6('bum): gi don do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
59b7('bum): do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do//
60a1('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ chung che'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
60a2('bum): do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshad che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do//
60a3('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do//
60a4('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
60a5('bum): tshig gi don do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od la gnas do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
60a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin/ ldan
60a7('bum): pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs pa/ bstan du pa/ thogs pa pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid par mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos thams cad kyi pa yang dag pa
60b1('bum): nyid la bslab par bya'o/ / chos thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni
60b2('bum): ma mchis pa yang dag pa nyid la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni ji ltar rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni dge ba dang / dge ba dang
60b3('bum): lung du bstan pa dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba pa dang /
60b4('bum): thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa dag ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / chos de dag thams cad kyi pa yang dag pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
60b5('bum): dpa' chen pos/ shes par bya ba yang chos thams cad po de dag nyid do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya ba ni/
60b6('bum): phar shes pa/ mar shes pa/ dge sbyong du shes pa/ bram zer shes pa/ rigs kyi nang na rgan pa la rim gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / sgom pa las byung ba'i
60b7('bum): bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang / nyams su blang ba dang ldan pa'i dngos po dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i 'du shes dgu ste/ 'di ltar rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / 'bu can gyi 'du shes dang / rnam
61a1('bum): par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang /
61a2('bum): 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu ste 'di ltar sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge
61a3('bum): 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dang / skye ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dag ste/
61a4('bum): de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ste/ 'di ltar rab 'byor srog gcod pa ni/ 'jig
61a5('bum): rten pa'i chos dge ba'o/ / rab 'byor ma byin par len pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba'o// rab 'byor 'dod pas log par g.yem pa ni/ 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba'o// rab 'byor du smra ba ni/ 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba'o//
61a6('bum): rab 'byor phra ma ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o// rab 'byor zhe gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba'o// rab 'byor tshig kyal pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba'o// rab 'byor chags sems ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba'o// rab 'byor
61a7('bum): gnod sems ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba'o/ / rab 'byor log par lta ba ni/ 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba'o// khro ba dang / mdud par 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal dang /
61b1('bum): log pa'i nga rgyal te/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lung du ma bstan pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// ngag gi las ni
61b2('bum): lung du ma bstan pa'o/ / yid kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// dbang po lnga ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// skye mched drug ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// gzugs pa bzhir skyes pa ni lung du ma bstan pa'o
61b3('bum): phung po rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ / khams rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// skye mched rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// rnam par smin pa thams cad ni lung du ma bstan pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos zhes bya'o//
61b4('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams brgyad dang / dge
61b5('bum): ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs par de ma yin pa/ 'jig rten pa'i chos gang
61b6('bum): ji snyed yod pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos shes bya'o/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ dran pa
61b7('bum): nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
62a1('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa pa dang / ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pa'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes par rtogs pa'i dbang po dang / rtogs pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas
62a2('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa cing dpyod pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin yid la bya ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad
62a3('bum): gang zhe na/ gzugs dang ldan pas gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// spug par mos par gyur pa 'di ni/ rnam par
62a4('bum): thar pa gsum pa'o/ / de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha'
62a5('bum): yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ / de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs
62a6('bum): te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga ba'o/ / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o//
62a7('bum): de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes 'du shes skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes 'du shes skye
62b1('bum): mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta
62b2('bum): ste/ de 'dod pas dben/ sdig to dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa
62b3('bum): dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa pa/ rnam par dpyod pa pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar
62b4('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa
62b5('bum): btang snyoms pa'o/ / zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang
62b6('bum): sdug bsngal yang pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas/ yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par
62b7('bum): gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/
63a1('bum): rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes te/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes/ cung zad
63a2('bum): pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes 'du shes skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du
63a3('bum): shes skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi
63a4('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tham ba stong pa nyid
63a5('bum): dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos
63a6('bum): po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
63a7('bum): zhes bya'o/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang /
63b1('bum): khams brgyad dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa ma
63b2('bum): mchis pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor zag pa pa'i chos ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi
63b3('bum): yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa med pa
63b4('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
63b5('bum): chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa pa'i chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i
63b6('bum): khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs pa'i khams dang / gzhan yang de ma yin pa/ 'dus byas kyi khams su gtogs pa'i chos rnams dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
63b7('bum): pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par
64a1('bum): 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / stong pa
64a2('bum): nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
64a3('bum): pa brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/ gang la skye ba cing 'jig pa pa dang /
64a4('bum): gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba pa ste/ 'dod chags zad pa/ zhe sdang zad pa/ gti mug zad pa/ de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/ chos nyid/ chos kyi dbyings/ chos skyon pa nyid/ bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings
64a5('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun mong gi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thun mong gi chos zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad
64a6('bum): pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang / thun mong gi chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun mong ma lags pa'i chos gang lags/
64a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi
64b1('bum): yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / ting nge
64b2('bum): 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
64b3('bum): brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la rtog pa pas chags par bya'o//
64b4('bum): chos thams cad gnyis su pa'i tshul gyis rtog pa cing / rnam par rtog pa pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang
64b5('bum): 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed par 'gyur bas
64b6('bum): de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa de lta bu'i phul/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyid par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi phung po chen po
64b7('bum): nges pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni/ rigs kyis dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa
65a1('bum): dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nas/ phyir ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag ste/ rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa
65a2('bum): zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i phul du byed par 'gyur ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul zhes bya'o// gsol pa/
65a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'khor ba dpag tu par sems can thams
65a4('bum): cad kyi don du bdag gis go cha bgo bar bya'o/ / bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis
65a5('bum): yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ / de ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa pas/ chos thams cad skye ba pa dang / 'gag pa pa bdag gis shes par
65a6('bum): bya'o/ / bdag gis ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o// bdag gis chos rtogs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa la bslab par bya'o// bdag gis chos kyi tshul
65a7('bum): gcig tu bsgrub pa khong du chud par bya'o/ / bdag gis chos dpag tu pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub par bslab par bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta
65b1('bum): bu ste/ de la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/
65b2('bum): sems can dmyal ba pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji snyed cig/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad sems can de dag gi don du bdag gis nyams
65b3('bum): su myong bar bya'o/ / snyam du sems bskyed do// de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen pos/ gong du sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por/ sems can gang yang
65b4('bum): phung po ma lus pa'i myang na las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyi bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag kyang / bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o// zhes thabs de lta bus sems can thams cad kyi don du/ sems can
65b5('bum): thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad kyang nyams su myong bar bya'o// de nas gzod bdag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/
65b6('bum): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas/ byang chub kyi tshogs mang po bstsags te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
65b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
66a1('bum): dpa' chen pos/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rlabs po che'i sems gang gis/ sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i sems rlabs po che bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems
66a2('bum): rlabs po che ni/ sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi skyed/ gti mug gi sems mi skyed/ gtse ba'i sems mi skyed/ nyan thos kyi sems mi skyed/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems mi skyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub
66a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che'o/ / des sems can thams cad kyi phul byed kyang / sems rlabs po che des rlom sems su bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ mi sgul
66a4('bum): ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems sgul ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed cing / des rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
66a5('bum): dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba'o/ / des sems can thams cad kyi phul du pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems
66a6('bum): bskyed par bya'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems ni sems can thams cad skyob cing / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la/ des rlom sems su 'gyur ba pa ste/ rab 'byor
66a7('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems te/ de la gnas shing sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
66b1('bum): dpa' chen pos/ rtag tu rgyun 'chad par chos 'dod par bya'o// chos la dga' bar bya'o// chos la mos par bya'o// chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o// de la chos gang zhe na/ chos thams cad dbyer pa ste/ 'di ni
66b2('bum): chos zhes bya'o/ / de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la 'dod cing mos pa ste/ 'di ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o// de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos de la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/ 'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o//
66b3('bum): de la chos la mos pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la yon tan du blta ba ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa zhes bya'o// de la chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la sgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa'i
66b4('bum): rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor
66b5('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ chen po stong pa nyid
66b6('bum): la gnas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'du byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid
66b7('bum): la gnas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ mi pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/
67a1('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dran
67a2('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas/ dbang po rnams la gnas/ stabs rnams la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
67a3('bum): lag brgyad pa la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas/ tshad med pa rnams la gnas/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par thar pa rnams la gnas/ mthar
67a4('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa pa la gnas/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/ gzungs kyi
67a5('bum): sgo rnams la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gnas/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la gnas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas/ byams pa chen po la gnas/ snying rje chen po la gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
67a6('bum): ba brgyad la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
67a7('bum): pas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ seng ge rnam par rtse ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal
67b1('bum): gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos kyi dbyings su nges pa'i
67b2('bum): ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge
67b3('bum): 'dzin la gnas/ rab tu bde bar gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po bde bar 'jugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'khrul pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od zer
67b4('bum): rab tu 'gyed pas 'khrul pa med par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ brtson pa'i stobs kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dpung rnam par dgod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar
67b5('bum): 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ tshig la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ phyogs su rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/
67b6('bum): chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rgyal po'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'khor gsum
67b7('bum): yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dbang po'i dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rgyun gyi rjes su song ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
68a1('bum): gnas/ seng ge rnam par rkyong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ seng ge rnam par glal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sne la zhi'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chags pa dang thogs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting
68a2('bum): nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ tshol ba pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gnas la rten pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sems pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ bdud bzhi 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dri ma pa'i
68a3('bum): sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dag pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od dri ma pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dga' ba
68a4('bum): byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ glog gi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zad shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'pham pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gzi brjid yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zad pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ g.yo
68a5('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'jig pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba dri ma pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mig yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ shes rab
68a6('bum): sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ snang ba gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ snang ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ bya ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ye shes dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge
68a7('bum): 'dzin la gnas/ sems gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rin chen mtha'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos dam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams
68b1('bum): cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos kyis 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos kyis 'phags pas yongs su rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rin po che nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/
68b2('bum): 'khrug pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam par 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam par nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dri ma med par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yi ge
68b3('bum): mnyam par 'god pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ pa gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'gyur ba pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ming dang mtshan ma la
68b4('bum): 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ bya ba dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nges par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gnas par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rab rib pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spyod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge
68b5('bum): 'dzin la gnas/ g.yo ba pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yul las rgal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sems par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nges par gnas
68b6('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mtha' yas sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/
68b7('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad las 'da' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yongs su gcod pa byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nem nur rnam par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gnas su bya ba pa'i ting
69a1('bum): nge 'dzin la gnas/ gcig tu rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa 'dor ba pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spyod pa dam
69a2('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ brda dang sgra la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rin chen snying po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad la chags pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/
69a3('bum): glog gi 'od zer bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos kyi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ye shes sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sgra dbyangs kyi
69a4('bum): yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mngon par pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ma 'dres pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/
69a5('bum): rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gzungs dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zad shes pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/
69a6('bum): gzungs kyi blo gros kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mthun pa dang 'gal ba
69a7('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od dri ma pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ snying po dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba dri ma par rgyas pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ glog gi 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rgyan chen po'i ting nge
69b1('bum): 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'jig rten thams cad skyob pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdul cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
69b2('bum): gnas/ nyon mongs pa par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gnas su pa la brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas
69b3('bum): de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ snod las rang 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ye shes chen po'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ stobs bcu'i
69b4('bum): 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sgo rnam par 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ngag gi
69b5('bum): skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ kun tu rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa pas rnam par grol
69b6('bum): zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor chos de dag la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi
69b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po drug pa/
70a1('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o// bcom
70a2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu don gang gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba de la spobs pa skyed cig/ sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du/ sems can rnams
70a3('bum): la chos ston pa dang / sems can du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / srog tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gso bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / skyes bur lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / shed can du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / shed bdag
70a4('bum): tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byed pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byed du 'jug pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / slong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yongs su slong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshor ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshor du 'jug
70a5('bum): pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / shes pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mthong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chad par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rtag par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yod par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / par lta bar rab tu spang ba
70a6('bum): dang / phung por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / khams su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / skye mched du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / bden par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / pha rol tu phyin par lta ba rab tu
70a7('bum): spang ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yang dag par spong bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / dbang por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
70b1('bum): stobs su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / bsam gtan du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshad
70b2('bum): med par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rnam par thar par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
70b3('bum): dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa med par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mngon par shes par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gzungs kyi sgor lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta ba rab tu spang
70b4('bum): ba dang / 'jigs par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / so so yang dag par rig par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byams pa chen por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / snying rje chen por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
70b5('bum): sems can yongs su smyin par bya bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chos su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba
70b6('bum): rab tu spang ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du/ sems can rnams la chos ston par bgyid kyang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/ de'i slad du byang
70b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs
71a1('bum): su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du shes su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du byed du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna bar lta bar
71a2('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ snar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lcer lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sgrar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ drir lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ror lta bar 'gyur ba
71a3('bum): yin/ reg tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ gi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sna'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lce'i rnam par shes par lta bar
71a4('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ gi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'du te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg par lta bar
71a5('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te
71a6('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg par rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
71a7('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chu'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rlung gi khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ nam mkha'i khams
71b1('bum): su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ma rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du byed du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dang gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ skye mched
71b2('bum): drug tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sred par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ len par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ srid par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ skye bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rga shir lta bar
71b3('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshul khrims kyis rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
71b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ phyi stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ stong
71b5('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chen po stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mtha'
71b6('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du lta
71b7('bum): par 'gyur ba yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dngos po pa stong po nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dngos po
72a1('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yang dag par spong bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dbang por lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
72a2('bum): stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'phags pa'i bden par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshad par lta
72a3('bum): bar 'gyur ba yin/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par thar par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
72a4('bum): ma pa dang / smon pa med par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mngon par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ gzungs kyi sgor lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mi
72a5('bum): 'jigs par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ so so yang dag par rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ byams pa chen por lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ snying rje chen por lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sems
72a6('bum): can yongs su smyin par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ byang chub tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dge 'dun du lta
72a7('bum): bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
72b1('bum): phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs su shing / pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// tshor bar shing pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// 'du shes su shing pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// 'du byed du
72b2('bum): shing pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ / rnam par shes par shing / pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// tu shig pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rna bar shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// snar dmigs shing
72b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ / lcer dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// lus su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// yid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i
72b4('bum): tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ / sgrar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// drir dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// ror dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// reg tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//
72b5('bum): chos su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rna ba'i rnas par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sna'i rnam par shes par dmigs shing
72b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ / lce'i rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// lus kyi rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// yid kyi rnam par shes par dmigs shing / dmigs
72b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ / mig gi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// sna'i 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
73a1('bum): lta ba skyed do/ / lce'i 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba
73a2('bum): skyed do/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing /
73a3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
73a4('bum): rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ / sa'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// chu'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// me'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
73a5('bum): gyis lta ba skyed do/ / rlung gi khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// nam mkha'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//
73a6('bum): ma rig par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// 'du byed du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// dang gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs
73a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ / skye mched drug tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sred par dmigs
73b1('bum): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ / len par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// srid par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// skye bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rga shir dmigs shing
73b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs
73b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par
73b4('bum): dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ / nang stong pa nyid du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// phyi stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i
73b5('bum): tshul gyi lta ba skyed do/ / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// chen po stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
73b6('bum): gyis lta ba skyed do/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
73b7('bum): gyis lta bskyed do/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
74a1('bum): gyis lta ba skyed do/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// mi pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs
74a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
74a3('bum): gyis lta ba skyed do/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// yang dag par spong bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// dbang por
74a4('bum): dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ / stobs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// byang chub kyi yan lag du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i
74a5('bum): tshul gyis lta bskyed do/ / 'phags pa'i bden par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// bsam gtan du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// tshad med par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// gzugs med
74a6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ / rnam par thar par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do//
74a7('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// mngon par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// ting nge 'dzin du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
74b1('bum): gyis lta ba skyed do/ / gzungs kyi sgor shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su shing pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// 'jigs par shing pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// so so yang dag par
74b2('bum): rig par shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ / byams pa chen por dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// snying rje chen por shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dmigs shing
74b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ / sems can yongs su smyin par bya bar shing pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// byang chub tu shing dmigs pa'i tshul
74b4('bum): gyis lta ba skyed do/ / sangs rgyas su dmigs shing pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// chos su shing pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// dge 'dun du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar dmigs
74b5('bum): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor bar lta
74b6('bum): ba dang / 'du shes su lta ba dang / 'du byed du lta ba dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir mig tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna bar lta ba dang / snar lta ba dang / lcer lta ba dang / lus su lta ba dang / yid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin// de'i phyir
74b7('bum): gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sgrar lta ba dang / drir lta ba dang / ror lta ba dang / reg tu lta ba dang / chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang / sna'i rnam par shes
75a1('bum): par lta ba dang / lce'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang / lus kyi rnam par shes par lta ba dang / yid kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir gi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang /
75a2('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
75a3('bum): rkyen kyis tshor bar lta ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar
75a4('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir sa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chu'i khams su lta ba dang / me'i khams su lta ba dang / rlung gi khams su lta ba dang / nam mkha'i khams su lta ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir ma
75a5('bum): rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du byed du lta ba dang / rnam par shes par lta ba dang / ming dang gzugs su lta ba dang / skye mched drug tu lta ba dang / reg par lta ba dang / tshor bar lta ba dang / sred par lta ba dang / len par lta ba dang / srid par lta ba dang /
75a6('bum): skye bar lta ba dang / rga shir lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha
75a7('bum): rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ phyi stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /
75b1('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa
75b2('bum): nyid du lta ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / mi pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong po nyid du lta bar
75b3('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yang dag par spong bar lta ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta ba dang / dbang por lta ba dang / stobs su lta ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag tu lta ba dang / lam du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir
75b4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan du lta ba dang / tshad par lta ba dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba dang / rnam par thar par lta ba dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
75b5('bum): nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med par lta ba dang / / mngon par shes par lta ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du lta ba dang / gzungs kyi sgor lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'jigs par lta ba dang / so so yang dag par rig par
75b6('bum): lta ba dang / byams pa chen por lta ba dang / snying rje chen por lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir sems can yongs su smyin par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba dang / byang chub
75b7('bum): tu lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
76a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phyir pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/ byang
76a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi bde la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems
76a3('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems de lta bu la yang chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de
76a4('bum): ni zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa'i sems de la yang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi slad du chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang
76a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i grangs su mchi'o/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyan thos dang /
76a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/ chos gang yang skye bar yang dag par rjes su mthong /
76a7('bum): 'gag pa dang / 'phel ba dang 'grib pa dang 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu gang la skye ba cing / 'gag pa pa dang / 'phel ba cing 'grib ba pa dang /
76b1('bum): 'ong ba cing 'bro ba pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa cing rnam par byang ba pa de la nyan thos kyi sems do// rang sangs rgyas kyi sems do// byang chub sems dpa'i sems do// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems do// tshe dang ldan pa sha
76b2('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ thams
76b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa pa/ khongs su chud pa pa/ de lta bu'i sems la yang chags pa do// zhes smras pa de ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bas gzugs kyang chags pa do// tshor ba yang chags pa do// 'du
76b4('bum): shes kyang chags pa do/ / 'du byed kyang chags pa do// rnam par shes pa yang chags pa do// kyang chags pa do// rna ba yang chags pa do// sna yang chags pa do// lce yang chags pa do// lus kyang chags pa

87b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa do/ / smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs pa yang gzugs la chags pa do// tshor ba pa yang tshor ba la chags pa do// 'du shes pa yang 'du shes la

87b6('bum): yang sna la chags pa do/ / lce pa yang lce la chags pa do// lus med pa yang lus la chags pa do// yid med pa yang yid la chags pa med do// gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa do// sgra pa yang sgra la
87b7('bum): chags pa med do/ / dri pa yang dri la chags pa do// ro pa yang rol chags pa do// reg pa med pa yang reg pa la chags pa med do// chos pa yang chos la chags pa do// gi rnam par shes pa pa yang gi rnam
88a1('bum): par shes pa la chags pa do/ / rna ba'i rnam pa shes pa pa yang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa do// sna'i rnam par shes pa pa yang sna'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do// lce'i rnam pa shes pa pa
88a2('bum): yang lce'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa do/ / lus kyi rnam par shes pa pa yang lus kyi rnam par shes pa la chags pa do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa pa yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do// gi 'dus te reg pa
88a3('bum): pa yang gi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa do/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa pa yang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa pa yang sna'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa pa la yang lce'i 'dus te
88a4('bum): reg pa la chags pa med do/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa pa yang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa pa yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do// gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa
88a5('bum): yang gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa do/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa yang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba las chags pa med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa yang sna'i
88a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa do/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byug ba'i tshor ba pa yang lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung pa'i tshor ba la chags pa do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa yang lus kyi 'dus
88a7('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba pa yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa do// sa'i khams med pa yang sa'i khams la chags pa do// chu'i khams
88b1('bum): pa yang chu'i khams la chags pa do/ / khams pa yang khams la chags pa do// rlung gi khams pa yang rlung gi khams la chags pa do// nam mkha'i khams pa yang nam mkha'i khams la chags pa med do// rnam
88b2('bum): pa shes pa'i khams pa yang rnam pa shes pa'i khams la chags pa med do/ / ma rig pa med pa yang ma rig pa la chags pa do// 'du byed pa yang 'du byed la chags pa do// rnam pa shes pa pa yang rnam pa shes pa la chags pa
88b3('bum): med do/ / dang gzugs med pa yang ming pa yang ming dang gzugs la chags pa do// skye mched drug pa yang skye mched drug la chags pa do// reg pa pa yang reg pa la chags pa do// tshor ba med pa yang tshor ba la chags pa do//
88b4('bum): sred pa pa yang sred pa la cags pa do// len pa med pa yang len pa la chags pa do// srid pa pa yang srid pa la chags pa do// skye ba pa yag skye ba la chags pa do// rga shi pa yang rga shi la chags pa myid do//
88b5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu
88b6('bum): phyin pa la chags pa do/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa do// shes rab kyi pha
88b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa do/ / nang stong pa nyid med pa yang nang stong pa nyid la chags pa do// phyi stong pa nyid pa yang phyi stong pa nyid la chags pa do// phyi nang stong pa nyid pa
89a1('bum): yang phyi nang stong pa nyid la chags pa do/ / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa do// chen po stong pa nyid pa yang chen po stong pa nyid la chags pa do// don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa yang don dam pa stong pa
89a2('bum): nyid la chags pa med do/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa yang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la chags pa med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa yang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la chags pa do// mtha' las 'das pa
89a3('bum): stong pa nyid med pa yang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la chags pa do/ / thog ma dang thams ma med pa stong pa nyid pa yang thog ma dang tham pa stong pa nyid la chags pa do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid med pa yang dor ba pa stong pa nyid la chags pa
89a4('bum): do/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la chags pa do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chags pa med do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med pa yang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
89a5('bum): nyid la chags pa med do/ / pa stong pa nyid med pa yang mi pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid med pa yang dngos po pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa yang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
