89a6('bum): la chags pa med do/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa med pa yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la chags pa med do// yang dag
89a7('bum): par spong ba med pa yang yang dag par spong ba rnams la chags pa med do/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa pa yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la chags pa med do// dbang po med pa yang dbang po rnams la chags pa med do// stobs med pa yang stobs
89b1('bum): rnams la chags pa do/ / byang chub kyi yan lag pa yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la chags pa do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa pa yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rnams la chags pa med do// 'phags pa'i bde
89b2('bum): pa med pa yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la chags pa med do/ / bsam gtan med pa yang bsam gtan rnams la chags pa med do// tshad med pa med pa yang tshad med pa rnams la chags pa do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa yang
89b3('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa med do/ / rnam par thar pa med pa yang rnam par thar pa rnams la chags pa med do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa yang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
89b4('bum): rnams la chags pa med do/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la chags pa med do// mngon par shes pa med pa yang
89b5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la chags pa do/ / ting nge 'dzin med pa yang ting nge 'dzin rnams la chags pa med do// gzungs kyi sgo med pa yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la chags pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs med pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
89b6('bum): stobs rnams la chags pa med do/ / 'jigs pa pa yang mi 'jigs pa rnams la chags pa med do// so so yang dag par rig pa pa yang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la chags pa do// byams pa chen po pa yang byams pa
89b7('bum): chen po la chags pa do/ / snying rje chen po pa yang snying rje chen po la chags pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do// thams cad shes pa nyid med pa yang
90a1('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid la chags pa med do/ / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med pa yang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la chags pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid pa yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa
90a2('bum): do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang // rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin
90a3('bum): pa'i sems des kyang chos thams cad la pa pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba / mngon par chags par 'gyur ba med pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams
90a4('bum): gang gi bus/ / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po
90a5('bum): khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig/ gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can lags la/ de ni theg pa chen po la
90a6('bum): yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can lags pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa gang
90a7('bum): po ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i zhig gi don du
90b1('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
90b2('bum): gnas shing / tshul khrims srung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims srung ngo // sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bzod pa
90b3('bum): sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bzod pa sgom mo// sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi/
90b4('bum): sems can thams cad kyi don tu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bsam gtan skyed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can
90b5('bum): thams cad kyi don du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bsam gtan skyed do// sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / shes rab sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu shes
90b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab sgom mo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can
90b7('bum): 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhe'am/ sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpag pas go cha mi gyon gyi/
91a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi don du go cha chen po gyon to// de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams
91a2('bum): cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ / bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang bzod pa'i pha
91a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ / sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang brtson
91a4('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ / bdag gis kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang shes rab kyi
91a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ / sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang nang stong pa nyid la sbyar bar
91a6('bum): bya'o/ / bdag gis kyang phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang phyi stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang phyi nang stong pa
91a7('bum): nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ / bdag gis kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems
91b1('bum): can thams cad kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ / bdag gis kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
91b2('bum): par bya'o/ / sems can thams cad kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang
91b3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ / sems can thams cad kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams
91b4('bum): cad kyang thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ / bdag gis kyang dor ba pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dor ba pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang rang bzhin stong pa
91b5('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ / sems can thams cad kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la
91b6('bum): sbyar bar bya'o/ / bdag gis kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang mi pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//
91b7('bum): sems can thams cad kyang pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dngos po pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dngos po pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis
92a1('bum): kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ / sems can thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang
92a2('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ / bdag gis kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas par bya'o//
92a3('bum): sems can thams cad kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang dbang po lnga la gnas par bya'o//
92a4('bum): sems can thams cad kyang dbang po lnga la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang stobs lnga la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang stobs lnga la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams
92a5('bum): cad kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sbyar bar bya'o/ / bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa
92a6('bum): rnams la gnas par bya'o/ / sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang bsam gtan rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang tshad
92a7('bum): pa rnams la gnas par bya'o/ / sems can thams cad kyang tshad med pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
92b1('bum): 'jug pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/ / bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas par bya'o//
92b2('bum): sems can thams cad kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rnam pa thar pa'i
92b3('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams
92b4('bum): la gnas par bya'o/ / sems can thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs
92b5('bum): pa'i stobs bcu la gnas par bya'o/ / sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'jigs pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o//
92b6('bum): bdag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang snying rje chen po la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang snying rje chen po la sbyar
92b7('bum): bar bya'o/ / bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o// zhes bya bar sems bskyed de// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
93a1('bum): ti'i bu de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
93a2('bum): tshe/ sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang
93a3('bum): thun mong du byas shing / bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//
93a4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni
93a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
93a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa
93a7('bum): yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson
93b1('bum): 'grus nyam par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
93b2('bum): dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing // de la pa gcig pa'i phyir/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi
93b3('bum): go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
93b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ des sbyin pa yang mi / gtong
93b5('bum): ba yang / len pa yang mi pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang
93b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la mtshan mar mi byed cing mi pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
93b7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
94a1('bum): bas sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi pa'i tshul gyis yongs su sngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul
94a2('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
94a3('bum): spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis la yang mos pa skyed na/ so so'i skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang mi smos pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha
94a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la bzod pa
94a5('bum): dang mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
94a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
94a7('bum): pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe/
94b1('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go 'byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
94b2('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams
94b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / tshul khrims des rlom sems su mi byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshul
94b4('bum): khrims de yang mi shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol
94b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su
94b6('bum): 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la
94b7('bum): bya bsam yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
95a1('bum): yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
95a2('bum): chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang
95a3('bum): sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
95a4('bum): pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten
95a5('bum): pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
95a6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyam par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod
95a7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams
95b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
95b2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
95b3('bum): chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bzod pa des rlom sems su mi byed cing / bzod pa mi pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
95b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
95b5('bum): dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa
95b6('bum): yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
95b7('bum): pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam
96a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
96a2('bum): sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang /
96a3('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub
96a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid
96a5('bum): la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi don tu brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed cing / brtun mi ngas pa 'di ni/ byang chub
96a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
96a7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
96b1('bum): po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma
96b2('bum): yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ brtson 'grus des rlom sems su byed cing / brtson 'grus de yang te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang
96b3('bum): sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
96b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o//
96b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
96b6('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
96b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
97a1('bum): cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can
97a2('bum): thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan
97a3('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
97a4('bum): yid la bya bas/ bzod pa yongs su sgom ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
97a5('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa
97a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par
97a7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
97b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba la sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
97b2('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba rnams kyi go 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam
97b3('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing // chos thams cad la sgyu mar
97b4('bum): byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bsam gtan des kyang rlom sems su byed cing / bsam gtan de yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
97b5('bum): byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
97b6('bum): chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
97b7('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin
98a1('bum): pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sdo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
98a2('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs
98a3('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na pa yang dag par
98a4('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
98a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa la mos shing rten te/
98a6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha
98a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
98b1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
98b2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
98b3('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
98b4('bum): yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
98b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
98b6('bum): bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
98b7('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis pha rol
99a1('bum): tu phyin pa 'di dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar byed mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po'o// tshe dang
99a2('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas shing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
99a3('bum): dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang mnyam par gzhog ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ro yang myong bar byed do//
99a4('bum): bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs te// bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
99a5('bum): ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thabs mkhas pa dang 'grogs pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad
99a6('bum): pa dang / / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben pa mthong ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mthong bas mnyam par gzhog ste/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du yang
99a7('bum): mi byed de/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po ste/
99b1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgyad pa// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
99b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing / ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/
99b3('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su su smyind par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod
99b4('bum): pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing / ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che
99b5('bum): ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su su smyind par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing
99b6('bum): dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing / yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo
99b7('bum): zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyind par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phral gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing
100a1('bum): dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams
100a2('bum): che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyi nad par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs
100a3('bum): rjes su sgrog go/ byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing yongs su sgrog pa mdzad do// 'jig rten gyi khams che
100a4('bum): mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyi nad par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs
100a5('bum): rjes su sgrog go/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi
100a6('bum): khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyi nad par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa
100a7('bum): mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing myid yongs su sgrog pa mdzad do/
100b1('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos po 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa
100b2('bum): mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che
100b3('bum): ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs
100b4('bum): rjes su sgrog go/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub
100b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyind par byed do/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ steng
100b6('bum): gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
100b7('bum): chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyin par byed do/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ smras pa/ tshe dang
101a1('bum): ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs zhes bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin// gang pos smras pa/
101a2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod de/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben sdig to dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/
101a3('bum): dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa pa/
101a4('bum): rnam par dpyod pa pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus
101a5('bum): kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba yang spangs
101a6('bum): shing yid bde ba dang / yid bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang / sdug bsngal yang pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/
101a7('bum): gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par
101b1('bum): byas shing rnam par spyod do/ / de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis
101b2('bum): klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa
101b3('bum): pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang
101b4('bum): ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i
101b5('bum): phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/
101b6('bum): nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam pa shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha'
101b7('bum): yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ma yod do zhes pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du
102a1('bum): pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes 'du shes skye mched la pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/
102a2('bum): nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad pa 'di dag dang / gzugs pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam pa ldang ba'i tshe yang /
102a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben/ sdig to dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog
102a4('bum): pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa rtog pa dang / rnam pa dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi
102a5('bum): rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa pa/ rnam par dpyod pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran
102a6('bum): pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la
102a7('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang / sdug bsngal yang pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan
102b1('bum): bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi
102b2('bum): dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/
102b3('bum): ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen
102b4('bum): po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par
102b5('bum): bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/
102b6('bum): shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par
102b7('bum): 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam
103a1('bum): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam pa shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las
103a2('bum): yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod de zhes pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes 'du shes skye mched la pa'i
103a3('bum): tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad pa 'di dag dang / gzugs pa na yod pa 'di
103a4('bum): dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam pa ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
103a5('bum): de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben sdig to dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//
103a6('bum): de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa pa/ rnam par dpyod pa pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis
103a7('bum): pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par
103b1('bum): spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o/ / zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid bde ba snga nas kyang
103b2('bum): nub pas/ bde ba yang / sdug bsngal yang pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/
103b3('bum): gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs
103b4('bum): pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing / rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod
103b5('bum): pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi/ dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i/ phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos
103b6('bum): par byas shing / rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems/ rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su
103b7('bum): rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi/ dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas/ gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu/ rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing / rnam par spyod do// de
104a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms
104a2('bum): pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam pa spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /
104a3('bum): sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa
104a4('bum): mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ma yod do zhes med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te
104a5('bum): gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes 'du shes skye mched la pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
104a6('bum): dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad pa 'di dag dang / gzugs pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par
104a7('bum): gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas
104b1('bum): dben/ sdig to dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye
104b2('bum): bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa pa/ rnam par dpyod pa pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba
104b3('bum): las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa/ btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga'
104b4('bum): ba pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang / sdug bsngal yang pa/ btang snyoms dang dran
104b5('bum): pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms
104b6('bum): pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad pa/
104b7('bum): gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//
105a1('bum): de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas
105a2('bum): pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs
105a3('bum): pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//
105a4('bum): de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
105a5('bum): mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//
105a6('bum): de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ma yod do zhes med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du pa'i skye mched las yang
105a7('bum): dag par 'das te/ 'du shes 'du shes skye mched la pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
105b1('bum): chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad pa 'di dag dang / gzugs pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam pa ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo
105b2('bum): ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben/ sdig to dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang
105b3('bum): bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam pa rtog pa
105b4('bum): pa/ rnam par dpyod pa pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas
105b5('bum): te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o// zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs/
105b6('bum): sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang / sdug bsngal yang pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems
105b7('bum): rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs ba'i phyogs bcu
106a1('bum): rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin
106a2('bum): tu bsgoms pa/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos bar byas shing rnam pa spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad
106a3('bum): pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing /
106a4('bum): rnam par spyod do// de pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/
106a5('bum): 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam pa spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du
106a6('bum): shes rnams nub bar gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
106a7('bum): mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ma
106b1('bum): yod do zhes chud zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes 'du shes skye mched la pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//
106b2('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad pa 'di dag dang / gzugs pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang /
106b3('bum): mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam pa ldang pa'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yogs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod
106b4('bum): pas dben sdig to dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa
106b5('bum): nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa pa/ rnam par dpyod pa pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ de dga' ba
106b6('bum): las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba pa'i
106b7('bum): bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang / sdug bsngal yang pa/ btang snyoms dang dran
107a1('bum): pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs
107a2('bum): pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam pa spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis
107a3('bum): pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing
107a4('bum): rnam par spyod do/ / de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis
107a5('bum): klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/
107a6('bum): gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod
107a7('bum): do/ / de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
107b1('bum): mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams
107b2('bum): cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ma yod do zhes pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes
107b3('bum): 'du shes skye mched la pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad pa
107b4('bum): 'di dag dang / gzugs pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
107b5('bum): chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
107b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings
107b7('bum): kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa
108a1('bum): pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam pa spyod do//
108a2('bum): de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i
108a3('bum): mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs
108a4('bum): su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam pa spyod do// de 'dod pas dben/ sdig to dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/
108a5('bum): rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud
108a6('bum): gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa pa/ rnam par dpyod pa pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan
108a7('bum): zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs
108b1('bum): te gnas so/ / de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang / sdug bsngal yang pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas
108b2('bum): so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la
108b3('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam pa shes pa mtha' yas so zhes/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam
108b4('bum): shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ma yod do zhes pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes 'du shes
108b5('bum): skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas/
108b6('bum): nyon mongs pa rab tu spangs pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan dang / tshad pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan la rjod cing 'chad pa dang / ston cing 'grel la rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed de/ de dag gi ro dang / de dag gi
108b7('bum): skyon dang / 'byung ba yang tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag
109a1('bum): gis/ bsam gtan dang / tshad pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam pa ldang yang 'di lta ste// nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi yang rung ste/ sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi
109a2('bum): 'byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma nyams pa'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang /
109a3('bum): tshad pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam pa spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to// snyam du sems shing yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang /
109a4('bum): mos pa dang / rtog pa dang / sems shing khong du chud par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
109a5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir/ brtson
109a6('bum): 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam
109a7('bum): gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang / nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
109b1('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gsum
109b2('bum): pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i yan lag dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes
109b3('bum): 'du shes skye mched de dag rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa pa'i rnam pa rab tu rtog kyang
109b4('bum): bsam gtan dang / tshad pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag shing / de dag gis rlom sems pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
109b5('bum): dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rnam pa
109b6('bum): thams cad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams
109b7('bum): cad du dbang po lnga sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du stobs lnga sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom pa dang /
110a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad du bsam gtan rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du tshad pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam
110a2('bum): pa thar pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa sgom pa dang / rnam pa
110a3('bum): thams cad du mngon par shes pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom pa dang /
110a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad du mi 'jigs pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du byams pa chen po sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams
110a5('bum): cad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du thams cad shes pa nyid sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
110a6('bum): sgom pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par
110a7('bum): gzhog cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes de la gzhol bar byed do// snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying brtse ba'i nyams su byed do// dga'
110b1('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag nyid kyis dgrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la sems so// btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la rab tu gzhol bar byed de/
110b2('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma la mnyam par
110b3('bum): gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims
110b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mnyams pa'o/ / nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam pa spyod cing / sa gnyis po nyan
110b5('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa skyed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing dga' ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems
110b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du/ brtson 'grus gtong bas rnam par spyod pa 'di ni/
110b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug
111a1('bum): pa 'di dag la yang mnyam par gzhog la/ bsam gtan dang / tshad pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang skye zhing // de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa yang la/ de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi
111a2('bum): 'gyur ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
111a3('bum): bsam gtan dang / tshad pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang la/ de dag la rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /
111a4('bum): stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon par yang 'jug par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad pa rnams la spyod pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha
111a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ nang stong pa nyid shes
111a6('bum): kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid
111a7('bum): shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis
111b1('bum): ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ rang bzhin stong
111b2('bum): pa nyid shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ pa stong pa shes kyang pa'i tshul
111b3('bum): gyis ma yin/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa ste/
111b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ chos thams cad la sems rnam par
111b5('bum): 'khrug cing mnyam par gzhag par shes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
111b6('bum): theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa 'jug/ rtag ces bya bar shes pa 'jug pa dang / bde zhes bya bar shes pa 'jug/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar shes pa 'jug/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar shes pa 'jug pa dang / bdag ces bya bar shes pa 'jug/ bdag ces
111b7('bum): bya bar shes pa 'jug pa dang / sdug ces bya bar shes pa 'jug/ sdug ces bya bar shes pa 'jug pa dang / stong zhes bya bar shes pa 'jug stong zhes bya bar shes pa 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya bar shes pa 'jug mtshan ma ces bya bar
112a1('bum): shes pa 'jug pa dang / smon pa yod ces bya bar shes pa 'jug smon pa ces bya bar shes pa 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//
112a2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang 'das pa'i dus la shes pa 'jug ma 'ongs pa'i dus la shes pa 'jug da ltar gyi dus la shes pa 'jug par byed de/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dus
112a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'di la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dus shes pa yang med pa ste/ tshed dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang
112a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ gzugs dang gzugs pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug pa byed la/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang gzugs pa'i khams shes pa yang pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha
112a5('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang de pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'jig rten pa'i chos la yang shes pa 'jug par byed
112a6('bum): 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos la shes pa 'jug par byed kyang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos shes pa yang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa pa dang /
