112a7('bum): 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang mi shes pa pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang de pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems
112b1('bum): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po la gnas zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang des sbyin pa yang / sbyin
112b2('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang / byang chub sems dpa' yang / len pa yang / yid la bya ba de dag kyang te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pa'i tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha
112b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des
112b4('bum): tshul khrims kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang / byang chub sems dpa' yang / yid la bya ba de dag kyang te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pa'i tshul gyis
112b5('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas
112b6('bum): kyang / des bzod pa yang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang / byang chub sems dpa' yang mi / yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pa'i tshul
112b7('bum): gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag
113a1('bum): par gnas kyang / des brtson 'grus kyang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi / byang chub sems dpa' yang / yid la bya ba de dag kyang te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
113a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
113a3('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas byang / des bsam gtan yang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang / byang chub sems dpa' yang / yid la bya ba de dag kyang te/ de ltar
113a4('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
113a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des dge ba'i chos kyang shing / mi dge ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang /
113a6('bum): zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos kyang shing shes rab kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang / byang chub sems dpa' yang / yid la bya ba de dag kyang te/ de
113a7('bum): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
113b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/
113b2('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis phyi
113b3('bum): nang stong pa nyid sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
113b4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don
113b5('bum): du de pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom mo/ rnam
113b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom rnam pa'i don du de mi pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas
113b7('bum): bsgom pa rnam pa bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam pa bsgom pa'i don du/ de
114a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis dor ba pa stong
114a2('bum): pa nyid sgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
114a3('bum): la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du
114a4('bum): de mi pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi pa'i tshul gyis pa stong pa nyid sgom
114a5('bum): mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
114a6('bum): bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi
114a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dngos po po'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo/ / tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres
114b1('bum): pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de pa'i tshul
114b2('bum): gyis yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi sgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad
114b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de pa'i tshul gyis dang po lnga sgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par
114b4('bum): bsgom pa'i don du/ de pa'i tshul gyis stobs lnga bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems kyi yan lag
114b5('bum): bdun sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad
114b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres
114b7('bum): pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhin sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de
115a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis tshad pa bzhi sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
115a2('bum): sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du// de mi pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
115a3('bum): ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam pa bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
115a4('bum): pa'i don du de mi pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa pa sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de
115a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom mo// rnam pa thams
115a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas
115a7('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de
115b1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'jigs pa bzhi sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam pa bsgom pa'i don du/ de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa
115b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam pa bsgom pa'i don du de mi pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam
115b3('bum): pa bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad sgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas
115b4('bum): zhes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad do zhes bya
115b5('bum): par shes so/ / gzugs su pa'i phyir gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// tshor ba su pa'i phyir/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// 'du shes su pa'i phyir/ 'du shes zhes bya ba 'di ni/
115b6('bum): tsam du zad do// 'du byed su pa'i phyir 'du byed ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// rnam par shes pa su pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// su pa'i phyir/
115b7('bum): ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// rna ba su pa'i phyir/ rna ba zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// sna su pa'i phyir/ sna zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// lce su pa'i phyir lce zhes bya ba
116a1('bum): 'di ni tsam du zad do/ / lus su pa'i phyir/ lus zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// yid su pa'i phyir// yid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// gzugs su pa'i phyir/
116a2('bum): gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// sgra su pa'i phyir/ sgra zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// dri su pa'i phyir/ dri zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// ro su pa'i phyir/ ro zhes bya ba 'di ni
116a3('bum): tsam du zad do/ / reg su pa'i phyir/ reg ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// chos su med pa'i phyir/ chos zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// gi rnam par shes pa su pa'i phyir/ gi rnam par
116a4('bum): shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do/ / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa su pa'i phyir/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// sna'i rnam par shes pa su pa'i phyir/ sna'i rnam par
116a5('bum): shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do/ / lce'i rnam par shes pa su pa'i phyir/ lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa su pa'i phyir/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba
116a6('bum): 'di ni tsam du zad do/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pa su pa'i phyir/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// gi 'dus te reg pa su pa'i phyir/ gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni
116a7('bum): tsam du zad do/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa su pa'i phyir/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa su pa'i phyir/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam
116b1('bum): du zad do/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa su pa'i phyir/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa su pa'i phyir/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// yid kyi
116b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa su pa'i phyir/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba su pa'i phyir/ gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du
116b3('bum): zad do/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba su pa'i phyir// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba su pa'i phyir/ sna'i 'dus
116b4('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba su pa'i phyir/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
116b5('bum): las byung pa'i tshor ba su pa'i phyir/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba su pa'i phyir/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
116b6('bum): tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do/ / sa'i khams su pa'i phyir/ sa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// chu'i khams su pa'i phyir/ chu'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do//
116b7('bum): khams su pa'i phyir/ khams zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// rlung gi khams su pa'i phyir/ rlung gi khams zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// nam mkha'i khams su pa'i phyir/ nam mkha'i
117a1('bum): khams zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do/ / rnam par shes pa'i khams su pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// ma rig pa su pa'i phyir/ ma rig pa zhes bya
117a2('bum): ba 'di ni tsam du zad do/ / 'du byed su pa'i phyir/ 'du byed ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// rnam par shes pa su pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes ba zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// dang gzugs su
117a3('bum): pa'i phyir/ dang gzugs shes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// skye mched drug su pa'i phyir/ skye mched drug ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// reg pa su pa'i phyir/ reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do//
117a4('bum): tshor ba su pa'i phyir/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// sred pa su pa'i phyir/ sred pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// len pa su pa'i phyir/ len pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// srid
117a5('bum): pa su pa'i phyir/ srid pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// skye ba su pa'i phyir/ skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// rga shi su pa'i phyir/ rga shi zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// sbyin pa'i pha
117a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa su pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa su pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do//
117a7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa su pa'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa su pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di
117b1('bum): ni tsam du zad do/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa su pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa su pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya
117b2('bum): pa 'di ni tsam du zad do/ / nang stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// phyi stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// phyi nang stong pa nyid
117b3('bum): su pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// chen po stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ chen
117b4('bum): po stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid
117b5('bum): ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ mtha'
117b6('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do/ / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid
117b7('bum): su med pa'i phyir/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid su
118a1('bum): pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// pa stong
118a2('bum): pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// ngo bo nyid
118a3('bum): su pa'i phyir/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// dran pa
118a4('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams su pa'i phyir/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// yang dag par spong ba rnams su pa'i phyir/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// rdzu
118a5('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su pa'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// dbang po rnams su pa'i phyir/ dbang po lnga zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// stobs rnams su
118a6('bum): pa'i phyir/ stobs lnga zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// lam su pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i
118a7('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// bsam gtan rnams su
118b1('bum): pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// tshad pa rnams su pa'i phyir/ tshad pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su pa'i phyir/
118b2('bum): gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// rnam par thar pa rnams su pa'i phyir/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
118b3('bum): rnams su pa'i phyir/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa su pa'i phyir/ rnam par thar
118b4('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// mngon par shes pa rnams su pa'i phyir/ mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// ting nge 'dzin rnams
118b5('bum): su pa'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams su pa'i phyir/ gzungs kyi sgo zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su pa'i phyir/ de
118b6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do/ / 'jigs pa rnams su pa'i phyir/ 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams su pa'i
118b7('bum): phyir/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// snying rje chen po su pa'i phyir/ snying rje chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su
119a1('bum): pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// de bzhin nyid su pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid su
119a2('bum): pa'i phyir/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid su pa'i phyir/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// chos nyed su pa'i phyir/ chos
119a3('bum): nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do/ / chos kyi dbyings su pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// chos kyi gnas nyid su pa'i phyir/ chos kyi gnas nyid ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do//
119a4('bum): chos skyon pa su pa'i phyir/ chos skyon pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// yang dag pa'i mtha' su pa'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// byang chub su
119a5('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas su pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas shes bya ba 'di ni tsam du zad do// zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/
119a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po dgu pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
119a7('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing / sems can yongs su smyin par byed do// sangs
119b1('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ mchod pa dang / rim gror bya ba'i tshul gang la gang 'os pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
119b2('bum): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to// de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
119b3('bum): du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byed kyang / de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang 'byung / sems can gyi 'du shes kyang 'byung / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang 'byung ngo // de
119b4('bum): gnyis su pa'i sa la gnas shing / lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthu yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing yongs su 'dzin te// de nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par ma gyur gyi bar du/ theg pa
119b5('bum): de dang nam du yang 'bral te/ des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
119b6('bum): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dang ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ro// de bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ shar phyogs kyi
119b7('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen
120a1('bum): po bla na pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog
120a2('bum): cing dbyangs su rjod pa mdzad do/ / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mos zhig tu/ byang chub
120a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo
120a4('bum): skor ba byed do/ / zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su rjod pa mdzad do// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing
120a5('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/
120a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes/ grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su rjod pa mdzad do// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs
120a7('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa
120b1('bum): 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su rjod pa mdzad do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten
120b2('bum): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na
120b3('bum): pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su
120b4('bum): rjod pa mdzad do/ / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems
120b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo
120b6('bum): skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su rjod pa mdzad do/ / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa
120b7('bum): mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
121a1('bum): nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su rjod pa mdzad do// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
121a2('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na pa'i theg pa/ theg
121a3('bum): pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su rjod pa mdzad do// 'og gi phyogs kyi
121a4('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po/
121a5('bum): bla na pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su
121a6('bum): rjod pa mdzad do/ / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems
121a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po/ bla na pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba
121b1('bum): byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su rjod pa mdzad do/ / de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di
121b2('bum): skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos so// go cha chen po bgos so zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bgyi ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa
121b3('bum): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i go cha gyon cing 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ tshul
121b4('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ nang stong
121b5('bum): pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/
121b6('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ chos thams cad stong
121b7('bum): nyid kyi go cha bgos/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha
122a1('bum): bgos/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i go cha bgos/ yang dag par spong ba'i go cha bgos/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i go cha bgos/ dbang po'i go cha bgos/ stobs kyi go cha bgos/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi go cha bgos/ lam gyi go
122a2('bum): cha bgos/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i go cha bgos/ bsam gtan gyi go cha bgos/ tshad pa'i go cha bgos/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/ rnam par thar pa'i go cha bgos/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
122a3('bum): 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i go cha bgos/ mngon par shes pa'i go cha bgos/ ting nge 'dzin gyi go cha bgos/ gzungs kyi sgo'i go cha bgos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi go
122a4('bum): cha bgos/ 'jigs pa'i go cha bgos/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i go cha bgos/ snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi go cha bgos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i
122a5('bum): go cha bgos nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// lho phyogs kyi 'jig
122a6('bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas
122a7('bum): par 'gengs so/ / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so//
122b1('bum): lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
122b2('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do//
122b3('bum): shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab
122b4('bum): tu skyod do/ / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
122b5('bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do/ / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+g+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye
122b6('bum): ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do/ / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do// des stong gsum
122b7('bum): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can dmyal ba'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i
123a1('bum): sgra rjod do/ / dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo //
123a2('bum): de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
123a3('bum): 'di na/ byol song gi skye gnas kyi sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal
123a4('bum): lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/ / dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas kyi sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ byol song gi skye gnas de dag gnas rnam par ldang ngo //
123a5('bum): de dag byol song gi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/
123a6('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams kyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod
123a7('bum): do/ / dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag gshin rje'i
123b1('bum): 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can
123b2('bum): dmyal ba'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i
123b3('bum): sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas
123b4('bum): kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams
123b5('bum): cad par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga'
123b6('bum): ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
123b7('bum): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ / des nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gU'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
124a1('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/ / dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dang /
124a2('bum): dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas/ rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag
124a3('bum): tu skye'o/ / des byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
124a4('bum): de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/ / dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ sems can dmyal ba de dag nas
124a5('bum): rnam par ldang ngo / / de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi
124a6('bum): khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed da dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do//
124a7('bum): dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can
124b1('bum): dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems
124b2('bum): can dmyal ba'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/ dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba
124b3('bum): pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs
124b4('bum): rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i
124b5('bum): phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/ dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i
124b6('bum): sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs
124b7('bum): rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i
125a1('bum): phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/ dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal
125a2('bum): ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas
125a3('bum): kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i phung po ji snyed cig yod
125a4('bum): pa de dag thams cad par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs
125a5('bum): rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang
125a6('bum): na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag
125a7('bum): thams cad par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs
125b1('bum): rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas
125b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ / des shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi
125b3('bum): skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe
125b4('bum): byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas
125b5('bum): rnam par ldang ngo / / de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o//
125b6('bum): des lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal/
125b7('bum): ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/ dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin
126a1('bum): rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par
126a2('bum): ldang ngo / / de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des nub phyogs kyi
126a3('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i/ sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag
126a4('bum): thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/ dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
126a5('bum): du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol
126a6('bum): song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des byang phyogs kyi 'jig
126a7('bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag
126b1('bum): thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/ dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i
126b2('bum): sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang /
126b3('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
126b4('bum): gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed da dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/

128a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sgra sgrog/ chos kyi sgra sgrog/ dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrog par gyur la/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i

128b2('bum): rten de nas rnam par bslang ba yod dam/ / gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
128b3('bum): tshad grangs pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su bkrol yang sems can gang yang yongs su grol bar byas pa do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin
128b4('bum): pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / stong
128b5('bum): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul pa byed do/ / de ltar bai DuR+Ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul pa byed do// de ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid
128b6('bum): mngon par sprul nas/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed do// skom 'dod pa rnams la skom gyi sbyin pa byed do// bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa'i sbyin pa byed do// gos 'dod pa rnams la gos kyi sbyin pa byed do//
128b7('bum): me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog gi sbyin pa byed do// phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba'i sbyin pa byed do// spos 'dod pa rnams la spos kyi sbyin pa byed do// byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa'i sbyin pa byed do// mal cha 'dod pa rnams
129a1('bum): la mal cha'i sbyin pa byed do/ / khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim gyi sbyin pa byed do// 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba'i sbyin pa byed do// yo byad 'dod pa rnams la yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do// nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod
129a2('bum): pa rnams la nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do/ / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul 'dod pa rnams la/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi
129a3('bum): ru dang / gser/ dngul gyi sbyin pa byed pa nas/ yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du sbyin pa byed de/ des de ltar zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/ skom 'dod pa rnams la skom byin/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa byin/ gos 'dod pa
129a4('bum): la gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa la me tog byin/ phreng ba 'dod pa la phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa la spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa la byug pa byin/ mal cha 'dod pa la mal cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa la khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa la 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad
129a5('bum): 'dod pa la yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DuR+Ya dang / dung dang /
129a6('bum): man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul byin pa nas/ yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin nas/ sems can de dag la 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// sems can de dag gis kyang
129a7('bum): chos bstan pa de thos nas/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang bral bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i

129b3('bum): cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung

129b5('bum): sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
129b6('bum): dpa' chen pos/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom byin/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa byin/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos byin/ me tog 'dod
129b7('bum): pa rnams la ni me tog byin/ phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa byin/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim byin/ 'tsho ba
130a1('bum): 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai D+'uR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru
130a2('bum): dang / gser dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai D+'uR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul byin pa nas yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin yang / sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
130a3('bum): rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'

130a5('bum): lam la rab tu 'god do/ / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
130a6('bum): bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
130a7('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang
130b1('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu 'god de/ sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du chos
130b2('bum): bstan pa de dang nam yang 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs
130b3('bum): zhig mngon par sprul te/ sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod dam/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang
130b4('bum): dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
130b5('bum): dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
130b6('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rgyad la sems can rnams rab tu bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems
130b7('bum): can gang yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa yod dam/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba
131a1('bum): bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
131a2('bum): pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
131a3('bum): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de
131a4('bum): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod de/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
131a5('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
131a6('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs
131a7('bum): kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang de dag la bkod pa do//
131b1('bum): rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
131b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
131b3('bum): shing / sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ brgya la sems can thams cad bdag la
131b4('bum): rdo dang / dbyig pas rdeg cing mtshon gyis 'debs kyang de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed par bya'o zhes go cha bgo ba byed cing / sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de 'dra ba la rab tu 'god pa byed do// rab 'byor 'di
131b5('bum): lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
131b6('bum): sbyor ba dang / rab tu 'god par byas na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhag pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de
131b7('bum): ni ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang bzod
132a1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go
132a2('bum): cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go
132a3('bum): 'god do/ / rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba dang gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe
132a4('bum): na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor 'di
132a5('bum): lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod
132a6('bum): na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa yod dam// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das
132a7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa
132b1('bum): do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
132b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
132b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
132b4('bum): chen po chos thams cad kyi chos nyid la gnas shing / chos gang la yang 'khrug pa'am/ 'khrug pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi
132b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog pa dang 'god par byas te/ de ltar yang dag par skul ba rnams kyang / nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol
132b6('bum): tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs
132b7('bum): shig mngon par sprul te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam//
133a1('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod
133a2('bum): kyang / sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'
133a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag
133a4('bum): par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ / rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba dang /
133a5('bum): gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ tshu rol
133a6('bum): tam/ pha rol tu te/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul
133a7('bum): zhing gzhog go 'god do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par
133b1('bum): sprul te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul te bzhag cing bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa

136b7('bum): bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar bdag bzod pa'i pha
137a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar bdag brtson 'grus kyi pha
137a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar bdag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
137a3('bum): gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/
137a4('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston te/ sems can de dag kyang
137a5('bum): chos de thos nas/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
137a6('bum): tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar
137a7('bum): bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar bdag bzod pa'i pha
137b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ / ji ltar bdag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/

137b3('bum): na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ / ji ltar bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig
137b4('bum): yod pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ / 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston te/ sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs
137b5('bum): ma rgyas kyi bar du/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar 'gyur ro// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/
137b6('bum): sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod
137b7('bum): pa de dag thams cad kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ / ji ltar bdag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / bzod
138a1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ / ji ltar bdag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / brtson 'grus kyi
138a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ / ji ltar bdag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang
138a3('bum): dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ / ji ltar bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing
138a4('bum): gzhog go 'god do/ / 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston te/ sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral
138a5('bum): bar mi 'gyur ro/ / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang /

138b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos
138b4('bum): kyang ston te/ sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/
138b5('bum): sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang dag par bskul zhing bzhag ste bkod par gyur na/
138b6('bum): rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang dag par bskul zhing bzhag ste/ bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan
138b7('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / nub phyogs kyi
139a1('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten
139a2('bum): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye
139a3('bum): ma snyed dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
139a4('bum): rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong
139a5('bum): phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu pa// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par spyod cing / sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go 'byed
