187b7('bum): drug rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / reg pa rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / tshor ba rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sred pa rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / len pa rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / srid pa rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /
188a1('bum): skye ba rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rga shi rtag ces bya bar shes pa'o// de la kun rdzob shes pa gang zhe na/ sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi sems sems kyis shes pa'o// de la 'dris pa shes pa gang zhe na/ gang
188a2('bum): gis lam shes pa dang / yongs su byang ba shes pa'o// de la sgra ci bzhin shes pa gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes te/ rab 'byor 'di yang pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
188a3('bum): po'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar dbang po gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o// zhes bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pa'i
188a4('bum): dbang po dang / yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po'o// de la yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o// zhes bya ba'i dbang po gang zhe na/ slob pa'i gang zag mngon par rtogs par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang
188a5('bum): po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po yongs su snang bar ma gyur pa 'di ni yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po'o// de la yongs su shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag slob
188a6('bum): pa yongs su shes par gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste 'di ni yongs su shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o// de la yongs su shes pas
188a7('bum): rtogs pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag slob pa dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge
188b1('bum): 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan
188b2('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa cing
188b3('bum): dpyod pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / de la rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben/ sdig to dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/
188b4('bum): dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ 'di ni rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rtog pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin
188b5('bum): gang zhe na/ bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar te/ 'di ni rtog pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la rtog pa cing dpyod pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa
188b6('bum): dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / cung zad pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes 'du shes
188b7('bum): skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o// 'di ni rtag dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
189a1('bum): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /
189a2('bum): chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang /
189a3('bum): lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang de pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di
189a4('bum): lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ de la bsam gtan bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di la byang
189a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pas dben sdig to dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba
189a6('bum): can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa pa dpyod pa pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i
189a7('bum): dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la
189b1('bum): dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid bde ba snga nas
189b2('bum): kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang sdug bsngal yang pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ de dag ni bsam gtan bzhi'o// de la tshad pa bzhi gang zhe na
189b3('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa
189b4('bum): yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu
189b5('bum): yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste
189b6('bum): mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ / de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig
189b7('bum): rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ gnyis pa/ tshad
190a1('bum): pa/ gcugs pa/ gnod pa pa/ ltod pa pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas
190a2('bum): shing pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod de/ de dag ni tshad pa bzhi'o// de la gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
190a3('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
190a4('bum): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa
190a5('bum): thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das
190a6('bum): te/ 'du shes 'du shes skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dag ni gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'o// de la rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par
190a7('bum): thar pa dang po'o/ / nang gzugs pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas/ phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du
190b1('bum): shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa
190b2('bum): thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes te/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang
190b3('bum): dag par 'das te/ ma yod do zhes pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes 'du shes skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs
190b4('bum): te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes 'du shes skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i bar du de pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do// de la
190b5('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pas dben/ sdig to dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang
190b6('bum): bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu
190b7('bum): gyur pas/ rtog pa pa/ dpyod pa pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du
191a1('bum): btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs
191a2('bum): te gnas so/ / de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang sdug bsngal yang pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas
191a3('bum): so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye
191a4('bum): bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes te/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du
191a5('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ma yod do zhes pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes
191a6('bum): 'du shes skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes 'du shes skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i bar du pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs shing
191a7('bum): gnas te/ de dag ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor
191b1('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gnas la'ang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gnas ma yin pa la'ang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
191b2('bum): shes so/ / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las dang / las yongs su len pa'i rnam par smyin pa/ gnas kyi rnam pa dang / rgyu'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'jig rten ni khams sna tshogs can te/ 'jig
191b3('bum): rten ni khams du ma pa'o zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sems can gzhan dang gang zag
191b4('bum): gzhan gyi dbang po rab dang / tham shes par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan
191b5('bum): dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran te/ tshe
191b6('bum): rabs gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/ tshe rabs brgya dang / tshe rabs stong dang / tshe rabs brgya stong dang / tshe rabs bye ba dang / tshe rabs bye ba brgya dang / tshe rabs bye ba stong dang / tshe rabs bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya
191b7('bum): phrag stong dag kyang rjes su dran no/ / bskal pa gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/ bskal pa brgya dang / bskal pa stong dang / bskal pa brgya phrag stong nas/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar dag kyang rjes su dran te/ bdag ni 'di lta
192a1('bum): bu zhig na 'dug 'dug go/ / ni 'di zhes bya'o// rigs ni 'di zhes bya'o// rus ni 'di zhes bya'o// zas ni 'di za za'o// yun ni 'di srid cig tu gnas gnas so// tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/ de ltar bdag
192a2('bum): de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig du skyes so zhes bya ba nas/ de nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'dir skyes so zhes bya bar rnam pa dang bcas/ sa mal dang bcas/ gtan tshigs dang bcas par rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran no// lha'i
192a3('bum): rnam par dag pa las 'das pas/ sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang / ngan pa dang / bde 'gro na 'khod pa dang / ngan song na 'khod pa dang / las ji lta ba bzhin du
192a4('bum): nye bar 'dong ba'i sems can rnams rab tu shes te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa dag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ log par lta bdag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i
192a5('bum): rkyen gyis lus zhig nas ngan song log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o/ / sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags
192a6('bum): pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi lha'i nang du skye'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// zag pa rnams zad pa'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam
192a7('bum): par grol ba zag pa pa/ rang gis mngon par shes pas mngon du byas te/ nye bar bsgrubs shing rnam par spyod do// bdag gi skye ba ni zad do// bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad do// bya ba ni byas so// rnam pa 'di lta bu gzhan ni
192b1('bum): do zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ rab 'byor de yang de pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar
192b2('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/ de la chos 'di rnams mngon par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/
192b3('bum): tshangs pa'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang / yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba pa thob pa
192b4('bum): dang / 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor kyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa
192b5('bum): 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar nus pa/ bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to// zhes bya bar ba dag la dge sbyong
192b6('bum): ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la
192b7('bum): bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba pa thob pa dang / 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge
193a1('bum): sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la
193a2('bum): bsten na/ bar chad kyi chos su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas de/ de'i phyir bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i rgyu
193a3('bum): yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba pa thob pa dang / 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor kyi
193a4('bum): nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ / tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// gang
193a5('bum): yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan byas na/ sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar 'byung ngo zhes bya ba de lta
193a6('bum): bu'i gnas de/ de'i phyir bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ste
193a7('bum): rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba pa thob pa dang / 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor kyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag
193b1('bum): go/ / tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang de
193b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ don so so yang dag
193b3('bum): par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang de pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa
193b4('bum): chen po'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gang gis nam la de bzhin gshegs pa bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs
193b5('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang gis nam la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa sdug
193b6('bum): bsngal zad par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis rjes su bstan te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mnga'o// ca co mnga'o// dgongs pa
193b7('bum): nyams pa mnga'o/ / 'du shes sna tshogs mnga'o// thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa mnga'o// ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mnga'o/ mos pa yongs su nyams pa mnga'o// brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mnga'o//
194a1('bum): dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa mnga'o// ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mnga'o// shes rab yongs su nyams pa mnga'o// rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mnga'o// rnam par
194a2('bum): grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mnga'o/ / sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // thugs kyi
194a3('bum): phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // 'das pa'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// da ltar
194a4('bum): byung ba'i dus lam thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang de pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
194a5('bum): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams te yi ge mnyam pa nyid dang / brjod pa mnyam pa nyid dang / yi ge'i sgo dang / yi ge la 'jug pa ste/ de la yi ge'i sgo dang / yi ge la 'jug pa gang zhe na/ a zhes bya ba ni ma skyes
194a6('bum): pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ / ra zhes bya ba ni rdul dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa ston pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// tsa zhes bya ba ni 'chi 'pho dang skye ba pa'i phyir chos thams
194a7('bum): cad 'chi 'pho dang skye ba pas/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// na zhes bya ba ni dang bral zhing gi rang bzhin ma thob ma stor bas chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// la zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das shing srid pa'i 'khri shing dang / rgyu dang rkyen
194b1('bum): yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ / da zhes bya ba ni dul ba dang dul ba'i gnas su yongs su nges pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// ba zhes bya ba ni bcings pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// Ta zhes bya ba ni
194b2('bum): dkrugs ma dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ / sa zhes bya ba ni chags pa pas chags par 'gyur/ 'ching bar 'gyur ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// ba zhes bya ba ni ngag gi lam dang sgra yang dag par chad pa'i phyir
194b3('bum): chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ / ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// ya zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du su pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// sta zhes bya ba ni khengs pa
194b4('bum): su pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ / ka zhes bya ba ni byed pa po pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// sa zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid du pas mnyam pa nyid las 'da' ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// ma zhes bya ba
194b5('bum): ni bdag gir bya ba pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ / ga zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// tha zhes bya ba ni gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// dza zhes bya ba ni skye ba
194b6('bum): pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ / shwa zhes bya ba ni dbugs su pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// d+ha zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings su pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// sha zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas su
194b7('bum): pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ / kha zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pas su pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// k+Sha zhes bya ba ni zad pa pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// sta zhes bya ba ni bstod pa
195a1('bum): pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ / dz+nya zhes bya ba ni ye shes su pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// rta zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// ha zhes bya ba ni rgyu
195a2('bum): pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ / b+ha zhes bya ba ni 'jigs pa pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// tsha zhes bya ba ni mdog pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// sma zhes bya ba ni dran pa pa'i phyir chos thams cad
195a3('bum): kyi sgo'o/ / hwa zhes bya ba ni bod pa pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// tas zhes bya ba ni mos pa pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// g+ha zhes bya ba ni stug po pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// tha zhes bya ba ni bsgrub pa
195a4('bum): pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ / Na zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa pas gang yang 'gro ba cing 'ong ba de/ gnas pa cing 'dug pa la nyal bar 'gyur ba pas rnam par rtog pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// pha zhes bya
195a5('bum): ba ni 'bras bu su pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ / ska zhes bya ba ni phung po su pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// yas zhes bya ba ni bde ba pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// tsa zhes bya ba ni spyod pa
195a6('bum): pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ / Ta zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// D+ha zhes bya ba ni g.yog pa pas mtha' thug par gnas par 'chi 'pho cing skye ba pa'i phyir chos thams
195a7('bum): cad kyi sgo ste/ de yan chad yi ge'i tha snyad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang la yang gang gis tha snyad du bya ba dang / gang gis brjod pa dang / gang gis bstan pa dang / gang bri ba dang / gang snang ba dang / gang klag par bya ba de
195b1('bum): lta bu'i gang yang do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' bzhin du chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa a las pa'i yi ge bstan pa la 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
195b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang gis a las pa'i yi ge la mkhas par bya ba 'di yongs su shes na/ de ni sgra gang la yang chags par 'gyur te/ thams cad chos nyid kyis yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur zhing sgra shes par bya ba la mkhas pa thob par 'gyur ro//
195b3('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang gis a las pa'i yi ge la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya 'di dang / a las pa'i yi ge la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag thos te/ thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
195b4('bum): kun chub par byed cing gzhan la yang tshul dang ldan pa'i blos ston na/ de la legs pa nyi shu yod par shes par bya'o// nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa dang ldan/ blo gros dang ldan/ rtogs pa dang ldan/ blo dang ldan/ dga' ba dang ldan/
195b5('bum): ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan/ spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo 'di yang nyon mongs pa par thob cing the tsom par 'gyur la/ gzhan las ngag snyan pa thos kyang chags par 'gyur ba cing zhe gcod pa'i tshig thos kyang
195b6('bum): khong khro bar 'gyur bas/ mtho ba cing dma' ba de/ tshul bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ba dang / sgra la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / phung po la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / khams la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / skye mched la mkhas
195b7('bum): par 'gyur ba dang / bden pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba ste/ rgyu la mkhas shing rkyen la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / chos nyid la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rab dang tha ma
196a1('bum): shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / lha'i rna ba'i shes pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / pha rol gyi sems shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur
196a2('bum): ba dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / zag pa zad pa shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa
196a3('bum): bstan pa shes par bya ba'i mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / 'gro ba la mkhas shing ldog pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / spyod lam la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / khrel yod pa dang ngo tsha shes pa la mkhas pa yang 'thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor
196a4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo a las pa'i yi ge la 'jug pa 'di yang de pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u
196a5('bum): dgu'o/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu bzhi pa/ rab 'byor gang yang khyod 'di skad du ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang
196a6('bum): dag par zhugs pa yin zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing sa nas sar 'phar te/ rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu
196a7('bum): phyin pa drug la spyod cing / sa nas sar 'phar ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad 'pho ba pas/ chos gang yang 'ong ba cing 'gro ba de/ 'pho ba'am nye bar 'pho ba do// 'on kyang chos thams cad kyis
196b1('bum): gang yin pa de la rlom sems su byed pa'am/ sems pa de sa yongs su sbyong ba yang byed pa ma yin la/ sa de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/
196b2('bum): rab 'byor sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su sbyong ba bcu po 'di dag bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ de pa'i tshul gyis lhag pa'i bsam pa las pa yongs su sbyang ba dang / mtshan ma
196b3('bum): pa'i phyir phan pa'i dngos po yongs su sbyang zhing sems can pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba dang / sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / len pa pa'i phyir gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /
196b4('bum): des rlom sems su bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen bstan pa yongs su sbyang ba dang / chos thams cad pa'i phyir chos btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / khyim pa'i phyir yang dang yang 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / mtshan
196b5('bum): dang dpe byad bzang po'i mtshan ma pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi sku la mas pa yongs su sbyang ba dang / chos kyi rnam pa pa'i phyir/ chos rnam par dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / chos kyi yang dag pa nyid pa'i phyir/
196b6('bum): nga rgyal dang khengs pa bstsal ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / tshig pa'i phyir bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba ste/ rab 'byor yongs su sbyang ba bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pas bya ba dag

197a1('bum): dang / byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba dang / bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa dang / rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang / snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba dang / bla ma bsnyen bkur

197a4('bum): zing par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed cing des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed cing / yongs su sngo yang des rlom sems su 'gyur ba dang / dpag tu pa'i
197a5('bum): 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba cing / des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba dang / ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas kyang de rlom sems su 'gyur ba ste/ rab 'byor chos lnga po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
197a6('bum): sa gsum pa la gnas pas gnas par bya ba dag go/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bzhi pa la gnas pas/ chos bcu po 'di dag yongs su blangs shing gnas par bya ste/ de dag yongs su gtang bar
197a7('bum): bya'o/ / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dgon pa la gnas pa dang / 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa gtang ba dang / bslab pa yongs su gtang ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa dang / mya ngan
197b1('bum): las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / rdzas thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang / sems zhum pa pa dang / dngos po thams cad la ltos pa pa ste/ rab 'byor chos bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa

197b3('bum): gang zhe na/ 'di ltar khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / dge slong ma dang bsten pa dang / rigs la ser sna byed pa dang / 'du 'dzi'i gnas dang / gnod sems dang / bdag stod cing gzhan smod pa ste/ chos drug po de dag ni yongs
197b4('bum): su spang bar bya'o/ / yang chos brgyad yongs su spang bar bya ste/ 'di ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yongs su spang bar bya'o// lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / khengs pa dang / phyin ci log rnams dang / the tsom dang / 'dod chags dang

197b7('bum): yongs su spang bar bya'o/ / sred pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o// slongs mo ba mthong na zhum pa par bya ste/ zhum pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o// dngos po thams cad yongs su btang bas yid bde bar bya ste/

198b1('bum): par bya ba dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i tshul rab tu rtogs shing / des rlom sems su bya ba dang / skye ba la bzod pa dang / skye ba shes pa dang / chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa dang / rtog pa
198b2('bum): yang dag par bstsal ba dang / 'du shes dang / lta ba rnam par bzlog pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gi sa dang / dul ba'i sems dang / zhi ba'i sems dang / thogs pa pa dang / byams pa'i skabs shes pa dang / gang du 'dod pa'i
198b3('bum): zhing du 'gro ba dang / thams cad du bdag gi ngo bo ston pa ste/ rab 'byor chos nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

198b6('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas chos bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po rab dang tha ma shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba dang / sgyu ma
198b7('bum): lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dang yang mnyam par gzhag par bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lus yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir ched du bsams shing srid pa nye bar len pa ste/ rab 'byor
199a1('bum): chos bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos brgyad pa la gnas pas yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dgu pa la gnas pas chos bcu gnyis
199a2('bum): yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di ltar smon lam mtha' yas pa yongs su gzung ba ste/ ji lta ji ltar smon pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam

199a6('bum): chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du brjod do/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i
199a7('bum): bsam pa las pa yongs su sbyang ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
199b1('bum): mang po yang dag par sdud pa 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa las pa yongs su sbyang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa'i dngos po yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
199b2('bum): po gang sems can thams cad kyi don du theg pa chen po'i ye shes tshol zhing sgrub par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa'i dngos po yongs su sbyang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la sems mnyam
199b3('bum): pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas// tshad pa bzhi ste/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms mngon par bsgrub pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la sems
199b4('bum): mnyam pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la rnam par rtog pa par sbyin pa de yongs su gtong ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gtong ba
199b5('bum): yongs su sbyang ba'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par skul ba dang / gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog par byed pa de dag ni/ byang chub sems
199b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la bsten pa dang / rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang bla ma la phu dud du bya ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba'o// de la byang chub
199b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas chos tshol zhing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos btsal ba yongs
200a1('bum): su sbyang ba'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ tshe rabs thams cad du 'du 'dzi par 'byung zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung
200a2('bum): yang de la bar chad byed pa gang yang pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/
200a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong nas/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par gyur gyi bar du/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang nam yang 'bral bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la mos pa
200a4('bum): yongs su sbyang ba'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur pa'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das
200a5('bum): pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la chos ston cing / thog mar yang dge ba bar du yang dge ba tha mar yang dge ba/ yi ge bzang po/ don bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba'i tshangs pa'i spyod pa 'di
200a6('bum): lta ste/ mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa
200a7('bum): dang / gtan la bab pa bstan pa dag yang dag par ston pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal dang / khengs pa
200b1('bum): bstsal ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ nga rgyal dang / khengs pa ji ltar bstsal ba des/ nam yang rigs dma' bar skye ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal dang / khengs pa bstsal ba yongs su sbyang ba'o// de la byang chub
200b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad du smras pa de ltar byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba'o// rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub
200b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pa'i yongs su sbyang ba bcu'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yid la
200b4('bum): byed cing / de ma yin pa'i tshul khrims ngan par byed pa dang / byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba'i chos gzhan dag kyang yid la byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o// de la byang chub
200b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ phan pa chung ngu zhig byas kyang 'khor ba zad kyi bar du chud mi gzon na/ mang po lta
200b6('bum): ci smos te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la gnod sems cing
200b7('bum): 'tshe ba pa'i sems te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams
201a1('bum): cad theg pa gsum la yongs su smyin par byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su
201a2('bum): gtang ba gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su gtang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba
201a3('bum): gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du sems shing bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can dmyal bar gnas par bya ste/ sems can
201a4('bum): thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ma bkod kyi bar du/ de dag du gtub cing gsheg pa dang / brdung zhing btso ba dang / bsreg pa las pa nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam ste/ de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi don tu spro zhing skyo ba pa ste/

201a6('bum): pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing tshol ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ las gzhan
201a7('bum): par sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir las gzhan med par pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su tshol ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing tshol ba'o// de la
201b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas ngoms pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am/ phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gang ji bstan pa de dag

201b3('bum): 'byed pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston pa'i tshe/ chos kyi sbyin pa des chung ngu na byang chub du yang re ba pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa'o//
201b4('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed cing yongs su sngo ba gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing / bdag dang gzhan gyi sems kyi zhing

201b6('bum): po'i dpag tu pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med pa gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis nye bar brten na/ sems can yongs su smyin par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar rton cing /

202a3('bum): gtang ba'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub la yang 'dod pa skyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
202a4('bum): 'dod pa chung ba'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog shes pa gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyang rlom sems su byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog shes pa'o//
202a5('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa gtang ba gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos zab mo rnams la rtog par gzhog pa'i bzod pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon
202a6('bum): tan gyi sdom pa gtang ba'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su gtang ba gang zhe na/ bslab pa thams cad rgyu ba pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su gtang
202a7('bum): ba'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i sems skyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa'o// de la byang chub
202b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i

202b4('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la ltos pa pa gang zhe na/ dngos po thams cad yid la byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la ltos pa pa'o//

202b7('bum): tsam du yang lhan cig gnas shing / de'i rgyus yongs su skom pa'i sems mi skyed cing / de'i rgyus gos 'thob par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o// de la
203a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ gang bdag gis sems can
203a2('bum): thams cad la bde ba'i rnam pa bsgrub par bya ba de dag sems can 'di dag rang rang gi bsod nams kyis bde bar gyur na/ de la bdag gis ser sna'i sems bskyed par bya'o// zhes bya ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs la
203a3('bum): ser sna byed pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du 'dzi'i gnas gang du gnas pas/
203a4('bum): nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas yod pa'am/ de dang ldan pa'i gtam 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am/ de dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas par bya ste/ 'di ni byang
203a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang ba'o/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnod sems yongs su spang bar bya ba yan zhe na/ gnod sems dang 'tshe ba'i sems kyi skabs
203a6('bum): 'byed cing / thab mo'i sems sam/ rtsod pa'i sems kyi go 'byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnod sems yongs su spang ba'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag
203a7('bum): stod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ phyi nang gi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag stod pa yongs su spang ba'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
203b1('bum): chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyi rol kyi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spang ba'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
203b2('bum): sems dpa' chen pos dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ de dag ni 'di ltar bde 'gro la yang bar du gcod na/ 'phags pa'i lam lta la ci smos te/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta la smos kyang dgos kyis
203b3('bum): spang bar bya'o zhes spong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spang bar bya ba'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe
203b4('bum): na/ de ni 'di ltar des chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba na gang gis nga rgyal du 'gyur ba'i lhag pa lta ci smos zhes nga rgyal du byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang
203b5('bum): bar bya'o/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des gang la khengs pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni
203b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyin ci log rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ dngos por pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub
203b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyin ci log rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/ / de la ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yid gnyis spang bar bya zhe na/ gang gi phyir chos thams cad yid gnyis dang bral bar mthong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
204a1('bum): po'i yid gnyis yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyam rangs su 'dor ba yin zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug
204a2('bum): yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyam rangs su 'dor ba'o// de la sa drug pa la chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug
204a3('bum): ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba ste/ de ci'i
204a4('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la gnas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams shes par bya ba'i gang chen mtsho lnga'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur to// phyin to// phyin par 'gyur ro// lnga gang
204a5('bum): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / brjod pa dang / 'dus ma byas te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
204a6('bum): dpa' chen pos chos drug yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/ nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o// 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o// 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi
204a7('bum): lam ma yin pas/ sred pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o// 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/ slongs mo pa mthong na sems zhum pa bskyed do// 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/ dngos po thams cad yongs su gtang bas yid bde bar bya'o// 'di ltar de ni byang
204b1('bum): chub kyi lam ma yin pas/ thog ma sems bskyed nas/ kha za yag gi sems su bya'i sbyin pa yongs su gtang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos drug yongs su spang bar bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub
204b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag tu 'dzin par bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bdag shin tu pa'i phyir ro// sems can du 'dzin par bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sems can shin tu pa'i phyir ro// srog tu 'dzin par bya zhe na/ de ni 'di
204b3('bum): ltar srog shin tu pa'i phyir ro/ / gang zag tu 'dzin par bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang zag shin tu pa'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chad par 'dzin par bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad shin
204b4('bum): tu ma skyes pa'i phyir chos gang yang chad pa pa'i phyir ro/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par 'dzin par bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos gang la skye ba pa de la rtag pa dang / chad pa pa'i phyir ro// de la ji
204b5('bum): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma'i 'du shes su bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa shin tu pa'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyur lta bar bya zhe na/ de ni
204b6('bum): 'di ltar des lta ba de yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'i phyir ro/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dang gzugs la mngon par chags par bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des/ de'i dngos po yang dag par
204b7('bum): rjes su mthong ba'i phyir ro/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phung po la mngon par chags par bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phung po shin tu pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na phung po la mngon par chags par bya'o//
205a1('bum): de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos// khams la mngon par chags par bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar khams rnams shin tu pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na khams la mngon par chags par bya'o// de
205a2('bum): la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ skye mched la mngon par chags par bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar skye mched rnams shin tu pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na skye mched la mngon par chags par bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub
205a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par chags par bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ khams gsum la mngon par chags par
205a4('bum): bya'o/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par zhe na par bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po cing pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
205a5('bum): khams gsum la mngon par zhe na par bya'o/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la brten par bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
205a6('bum): chen pos khams gsum la brten par bya'o/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la gnas par bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
205a7('bum): dpa' chen pos/ khams gsum la gnas par bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sangs rgyas la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas su lta ba la brten
205b1('bum): pas/ sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sangs rgyas la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos la brten
205b2('bum): pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos su lta ba la brten pas/ chos mthong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par bya'o//
205b3('bum): de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ dge 'dun la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dge 'dun du lta ba la brten pas/ dge 'dun mthong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
205b4('bum): sems dpa' chen pos/ dge 'dun la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ tshul khrims la brten pa'i lta bu la mngon par chags par bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshul
205b5('bum): khrims su lta ba la brten pas/ tshul khrims rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ tshul khrims la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems
205b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos rnams stong ngo zhes zhum par bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ma yin gyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/
205b7('bum): stong pa nyid la zhum par bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa bas/ stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar byed pa'i phyir te/
206a1('bum): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba yin zhe na/ rang gi mtshan
206a2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma pa mngon du bya ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan ma
206a3('bum): thams cad yid la byed pa'i phyir ro/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smon pa pa shes pa yin zhe na/ de ni khams gsum thams cad du sems 'jug pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
206a4('bum): chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing snying brtse ba yongs su
206a5('bum): rdzogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can thams cad la brnyas par bya zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro//
206a6('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta ba gang yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la bsnan pa dang dbri ba pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag pa'i
206a7('bum): tshul rab tu rtogs pa gang yin zhe na/ chos thams cad tshul gcig tu rtogs kyang rtogs pa pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba la bzod pa gang yin zhe na/ chos thams cad skye ba pa dang / 'gag pa pa
206b1('bum): dang / mngon par 'du bya ba pa la bzod pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba shes pa gang yin zhe na/ dang gzugs skye ba shes pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba shes pa'o// de la byang
206b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa gang yin zhe na/ gnyis la yongs su rgyu ba pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// de la byang chub
206b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtog pa yang dag par bstsal ba gang yin zhe na/ chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lta ba rnam par bzlog pa gang yin zhe na/ nyan thos kyis dang / rang sangs
206b4('bum): rgyas kyis rnam par spong ba'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog pa gang yin zhe na/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad zad pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
206b5('bum): zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis gang yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes so// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dul ba'i sems gang yin zhe na/ khams gsum la dga' bar sems pa pa'o//
206b6('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi ba'i sems gang zhe na/ dbang po drug yang dag par 'dus pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thogs pa pa'i ye shes gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi
206b7('bum): spyan thob pa'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa'i skabs shes pa gang zhe na/ skye mched drug gi btang snyoms so// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang du 'dod pa'i zhing du 'gro ba gang zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi
207a1('bum): zhing gcig nas kyang ma g.yos bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyang yang dag par mthong la/ 'di la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang 'byung ba gang yin pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thams cad du bdag gi ngo bo ston pa gang
207a2('bum): zhe na/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su gang dang gang la dga' ba de la ci ltar dga' ba rang gi ngo bo de dang de ston pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad kyi sems khong du chud pa gang zhe na/ sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems
207a3('bum): las byung ba rab tu shes pa'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rnam par rtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas blta ba'i don du 'gro yang / de la sangs rgyas kyi 'du
207a4('bum): shes su 'gyur ba'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing blta ba gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na 'dug cing dpag tu pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong yang / de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes su 'gyur ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
207a5('bum): dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du yongs su bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i sa la gnas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gtong zhing / des rlom sems su byed
207a6('bum): pa'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i don du chos la bsnyen bkur ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa gang zhe na/
207a7('bum): chos kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par byed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dbang po rab dang / tha ma shes pa gang zhe na/ stobs bcu la gnas shing / sems can thams cad dbang po yongs su rdzogs par shes
207b1('bum): pa'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba gang zhe na/ pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems yongs su sbyong ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgyu ma lta bu'i
207b2('bum): ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thams cad byed kyang / de'i sems chos gang la yang 'jug pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang mnyam par
207b3('bum): gzhag pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par smyin pa las skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ji ltar 'grub pa de lta de ltar lus
207b4('bum): yongs su sgrub pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams ji lta ji ltar yongs su smyin par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar ched du bsams shing lus yongs su 'dzin to// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
207b5('bum): chen po ched du bsams shing / srid pa nye bar len pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar smon pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba
207b6('bum): yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ ji lta ji ltar smon pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
207b7('bum): chen pos/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas khong
208a1('bum): du chud pa'o/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su rdzogs pa'i spobs pas nges par bstan pa shes par bya ba rtogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas khong du chud
208a2('bum): pa'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshe rabs thams cad du rdzus shing skye ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
208a3('bum): dpa' chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs chen por skye ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems
208a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyud phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/ bram ze'i rigs
208a5('bum): che zhing mtho bar skye ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyud phun sum tshogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
208a6('bum): gang gi rigs su sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams byung bar gyur pa de'i rigs su skye ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
208a7('bum): 'khor phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub tu sems can rnams bkod cing / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
208b1('bum): 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/ de dag rnam pa drug
208b2('bum): tu g.yo bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe phun sum tshogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
208b3('bum): po rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang / lhan cig tu mngon par 'byung zhing sems can de dag kyang theg pa gsum la nges par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun
208b4('bum): sum tshogs pa'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rtsa ba gser gyi rgyu las byung ba yin/ lhun baiDU rlar
208b5('bum): 'dug pa yin/ yal ga rin po ce bdun gyi rang bzhin las grub pa yin/ me tog dang / lo ma rin po ce thams cad las gyur pa yin/ shing de'i dri zhim po dang / 'od bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa rgyas par gang ba yin te/
208b6('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems
208b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum
209a1('bum): tshogs pa'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bcu la gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su
209a2('bum): rdzogs par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon
209a3('bum): mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dag ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la gnas pa ni de bzhin
209a4('bum): gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o/ / rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /
209a5('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /
209a6('bum): nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid
209a7('bum): la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tham pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la
209b1('bum): spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo
209b2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan
209b3('bum): lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / tshad pa rnams la spyod pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par
209b4('bum): 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la spyod pa dang / mngon
209b5('bum): par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa dang / 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod
209b6('bum): pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/ dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/ rigs kyis las yang dag par 'da'/ brgya dpa'i sa las yang dag par
209b7('bum): 'da'/ mthong ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/ bsrabs pa'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/ byas pa rtogs pa'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/ nyan thos kyis las yang dag par
210a1('bum): 'da'/ rang sangs rgyas kyis las yang dag par 'a da'/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa las yang dag par 'da' ste/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de ltar sa dgu las yongs su 'das
210a2('bum): nas/ sangs rgyas kyis la gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu'o// rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par rig par bya'o// //
210a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bco lnga pa// rab 'byor khyod kyis gang yang 'di skad du theg pa de gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras ba ni/ de pa'i tshul gyis khams gsum nas 'byung bar
210a4('bum): 'gyur ro/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma yin
210a5('bum): ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs pa/ bstan tu pa/ thogs pa pa/ thogs pa pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mtshan nyid pa'i chos ni 'byung ba'am/ 'byung chub 'gyur ba'am/ byung
210a6('bum): bar gyur pa de/ rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid 'byung bar
210a7('bum): 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung ba ra 'dod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni bsam gyis khyab pa'i
210b1('bum): dbyings 'byung par 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung chub 'dod pa de ni nam mkha'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'dod chags zad pa'i
210b2('bum): dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rab tu byang ba'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i tshos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'dod

210b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do/ / rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// 'du shes stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// 'du byed
211a1('bum): stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// rnam par shes pa ltong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa
211a2('bum): do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// tshor ba tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro// 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ba'i phyir ro// rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong
211a3('bum): ba'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rna ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du

214a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i

214a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do/ / sgyu ma'i khams gsum nas 'byung nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// smyig rgyu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
214a7('bum): du gnas pa do/ / sgra brnyan ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// yor ni khams gsum nas 'byung pa do// rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do//

214b2('bum): ro/ / smyig rgyu ni smyig rgyus stong pa'i phyir ro// sgra brnyan ni sgra brnyan gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// yor ni yor gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab
214b3('bum): 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar

214b6('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do//
214b7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad
215a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni
215a2('bum): khams gsum nas 'byung ba do/ / rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// rab 'byor
215a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir
215a4('bum): ro/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha tu pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha tu pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//
215a5('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha tu pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// shes rab kyi pha tu pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ba'i phyir ro//

215a7('bum): do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
215b1('bum): 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ chen po stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ don dam pa
