215b5('bum): du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ chos thams cad
215b6('bum): stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung par 'dod pa de ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod
215b7('bum): pa de ni/ pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i
216a1('bum): chos rnams 'byung bar dod pa de ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//
216a2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// phyi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do//
216a3('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung pa do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// chen po stong
216a4('bum): pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// don dam pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// 'dus byas stong
216a5('bum): pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
216a6('bum): nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do/ / rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// dor ba
216a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// chos
216b1('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// pa
216b2('bum): stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// ngo bo nyid stong pa
216b3('bum): nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// rab 'byor de ci'i
216b4('bum): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ba'i phyir ro// phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa phyir ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i
216b5('bum): phyir ro/ / chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ba'i phyir ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
216b6('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// dor ba
216b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rang gi mtshan nyid
217a1('bum): stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / pa stong pa nyid pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// dngos po pa stong pa nyid dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//
217a2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa
217a3('bum): de ni/ dran pa nye par gzhag pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams/ 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid
217a4('bum): pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ dbang po rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor
217a5('bum): gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ stobs rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//
217a6('bum): rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum
217a7('bum): nas 'byung ba do/ / rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// yang dag par spong pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
217b1('bum): rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum rnam 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// stongs
217b2('bum): rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas
217b3('bum): pa do/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni dran
217b4('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / yang dag par spong pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
217b5('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni// stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo
217b6('bum): nyid ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos
217b7('bum): rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gtan rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan
218a1('bum): nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ tshad pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'byung bar
218a2('bum): 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i
218a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de
218a4('bum): ni/ mtshan ma pa 'byung par 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid par chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ smon pa pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni
218a5('bum): khams gsum nas 'byung ba do/ / rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// tshad pa rnams
218a6('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas
218a7('bum): pa do/ / rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam
218b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do/ / stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// mtshan ma pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad
218b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do/ / smon pa pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni 'phags pa'i
218b3('bum): bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// tshad pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni tshad pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// gzugs
218b4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni// rnam par thar ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// mthar kyis gnas
218b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// mtshan ma pa'i ngo bo nyid ni mtshan ma
218b6('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / smon pa pa'i ngo bo nyid ni smon pa pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'gyur bar 'dod du zad do//
218b7('bum): rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i cos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//
219a1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba
219a2('bum): do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon
219a3('bum): par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ gzungs
219a4('bum): kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung
219a5('bum): bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'jigs pa bzhi 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams
219a6('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
219a7('bum): nyid du gnas pa do/ / 'jigs pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa
219b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin
219b2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// so so yang dag par rig pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ so so yang dag
219b3('bum): par rig pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ dgra
219b4('bum): bcom pa zag pa zad pa skye bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rang sangs rgyas skye ba 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa
219b5('bum): de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' skye bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir
219b6('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// rang sangs rgyas ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
219b7('bum): gnas pa do/ / byang chub sems dpa' ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni khams gsum
220a1('bum): nas 'byung ba do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo
220a2('bum): nyid ni/ / rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//

220a4('bum): bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ dgra bcom pa
220a5('bum): nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rang byang chub 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ lam gyi
220a6('bum): rnam par shes pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
220a7('bum): 'bras bu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do//
220b1('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// dgra bcom pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rang byang chub ni khams
220b2('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba do/ / rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni khams
220b3('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba byed do/ / rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// lan cig phyir 'ong
220b4('bum): ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ dgra bcom
220b5('bum): pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid ni rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid ni rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ngo bo nyid ni
220b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa
220b7('bum): de ni/ mtshan ma 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ brda 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ tha snyad 'byung
221a1('bum): bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ gdags pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor stong ba nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa
221a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do/ / mtshan ma stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// brda stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
221a3('bum): gnas pa do/ / tha snyad stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do// dag pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa do//
221a4('bum): rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// mtshan ma stong pa nyid mtshan ma stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// brda stong pa nyid brda stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//
221a5('bum): tha snyad stong pa nyid tha snyad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// gdags pa stong pa nyid gdags pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ skye ba pa

232b3('bum): gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am gnas pa do// rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid la ni/ gnas pa 'am gnas pa do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
232b4('bum): de ni 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas pa yang ma yin
232b5('bum): gnas pa yang ma yin no/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni gnas pa yang ma
232b6('bum): yin gnas pa yang ma yin no/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am gnas pa do// de bzhin gshegs
232b7('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am gnas pa do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo
233a1('bum): nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po/ de yang gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma
233a2('bum): yin no/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper
233a3('bum): na/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dgra bcom pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma
233a4('bum): yin gnas pa yang ma yin no/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rang byang chub ni gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor
233a5('bum): de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am gnas pa do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid la ni
233a6('bum): gnas pa 'am gnas pa med do/ / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am gnas pa do// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am gnas pa do// rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am gnas pa
233a7('bum): do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis
233b1('bum): stong pa'i phyir ro/ / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo po nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid rang byang chub kyi ngo bo
233b2('bum): nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor 'di ltar ste dper na/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab
233b3('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor lam gyi rnam
233b4('bum): pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am gnas pa do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am gnas pa do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes
233b5('bum): pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ ni gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no/
233b6('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ mtshan ma ni gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang
233b7('bum): ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ brda ni gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di
234a1('bum): lta ste dper na/ tha snyad ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gdags pa ni
234a2('bum): gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am gnas pa do// mtshan
234a3('bum): ma'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am gnas pa do/ / brda'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am gnas pa do// tha snyad kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am gnas pa do// gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am gnas pa do//
234a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gi ngo bo nyid gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa 'i phyir ro// mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid la mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// brda'i ngo bo nyid brda'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// tha snyad kyi ngo
234a5('bum): bo nyid tha snyad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skye ba med pa ni gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de
234a6('bum): bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'gag pa pa ni gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas
234a7('bum): pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ kun nas nyon mongs pa pa ni/ gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin gnas
234b1('bum): pa yang ma yin no/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rnam par byang ba pa ni gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
234b2('bum): 'byor skye ba pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am gnas pa do/ / 'gag pa pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am gnas pa do// kun nas nyon mongs pa pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am gnas pa do// rnam par byang ba
234b3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am ma gnas pa do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar skye ba pa'i ngo bo nyid skye ba pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'gag pa pa'i ngo bo nyid 'gag pa pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir
234b4('bum): ro/ / kun nas nyon mongs pa pa'i ngo bo nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rnam par byang ba pa'i ngo bo nyid rnam par byang ba pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ mngon
234b5('bum): par 'du bya ba med pa ni gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mngon par 'du bya ba pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni
234b6('bum): gnas pa 'am gnas pa do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar mngon par 'du bya ba pa'i ngo bo nyid mngon par 'du bya ba pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/
234b7('bum): bam po bcu bdun pa// rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ theg pa chen po de ni gnas par gnas pa'i tshul dang / bskyod du pa'i tshul gyis gang du yang gnas par 'gyur ba do// rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di
235a1('bum): skad du theg pa des su zhig 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni/ theg pa des su yang 'byung par 'gyur ba do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar theg pa de gang yin pa dang / gang 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gis 'byung
235a2('bum): bar 'gyur ba dang / gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad cing pa'i phyir te/ de ltar chos thams cad cing na/ chos gang zhig chos gang gis 'byung bar 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar
235a3('bum): bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sems can shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / srog shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / 'gro ba shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / gso ba shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / skyes bu shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / gang zag shin tu rnam
235a4('bum): par dag pa dang / shed can shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / shed bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / byed pa po shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba po shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / shes pa po shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / mthong ba po shin tu rnam par dag
235a5('bum): pa'i phyir/ mtha' las 'das pas bdag su do// sems can su do// srog su do// 'gro ba su do// gso ba su do// skyes bu su do// gang zag su
235a6('bum): do/ / shed can su do// shed bdag su do// byed pa po su do// tshor ba po su do// shes pa po su do// mthong ba po su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
235a7('bum): chos kyi dbyings su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i mtha' su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings
235b1('bum): su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ phung po rnams su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ khams rnams su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ skye mched rnams su do// shin tu rnam par dag
235b2('bum): pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
235b3('bum): phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa su do// shin tu rnam
235b4('bum): par dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
235b5('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir stong pa nyid stong pa nyid su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir don dam pa stong pa
235b6('bum): nyid su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong
235b7('bum): pa nyid su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dmigs su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dor ba pa stong pa nyid su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rang bzhin
236a1('bum): stong pa nyid su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
236a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dngos po pa stong pa nyid su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo
236a3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yang dag par spong ba rnams su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
236a4('bum): rnams su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dbang po rnams su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir stobs rnams su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su do//
236a5('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gtan rnams su do//
236a6('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshad pa rnams su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa rnams su do// shin tu
236a7('bum): rnam par dag pa'i phyir mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa su do// shin tu rnam par
236b1('bum): dag pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa rnams su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnams su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin
236b2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'jigs pa rnams su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa rnams su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir snying rje
236b3('bum): chen po su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun tu zhugs pa su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba
236b4('bum): su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyir 'ong ba su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
236b5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu su
236b6('bum): do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid su do// shin tu
236b7('bum): rnam par dag pa'i phyir rang byang chub su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid su do// shin tu rnam par dag
237a1('bum): pa'i phyir/ skye ba pa su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gag pa pa su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa pa su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
237a2('bum): rnam par byang ba pa su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mngon par 'du bya ba pa su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sngon gyi mtha' su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'
237a3('bum): su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir da ltar byung ba su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'ong ba su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gro ba su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gnas pa
237a4('bum): su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'chi 'pho su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir skye ba su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'grib pa su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
237a5('bum): 'phel ba su do/ / gang mi pa thams cad su pa yin zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings pas chos kyi dbyings su do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings su pa ni
237a6('bum): pa yang ma yin pa yang ma yin no/ / de bzhin nyid mi dmigs pas de bzhin nyid su do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid su med pa ni dmigs pa yang ma yin mi pa yang ma yin no//
237a7('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' pas yang dag pa'i mtha' su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' su pa ni pa yang ma yin pa yang ma yin no// bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings
237b1('bum): pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dmigs su med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings su med pa ni/ dmigs pa yang ma yin mi dmigs pa yang ma yin no// phung po dang khams dang skye mched
237b2('bum): mi dmigs pas phung po dang khams dang skye mched dmigs su med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor phung po dang khams dang skye mched dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa yang ma yin mi dmigs pa yang ma yin no// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi
237b3('bum): dmigs pas/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dmigs su pa ni/ dmigs pa yang ma yin mi dmigs pa yang ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi
237b4('bum): dmigs pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa yang ma yin mi dmigs pa yang ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs
237b5('bum): pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa yang ma yin mi dmigs pa yang ma yin no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
237b6('bum): mi dmigs pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa yang ma yin mi dmigs pa yang ma yin no// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
237b7('bum): phyin pa mi dmigs pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa su med pa ni/ dmigs pa yang ma yin mi dmigs pa yang ma yin no//
238a1('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa yang ma yin mi
238a2('bum): dmigs pa yang ma yin no/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa yang ma yin mi
238a3('bum): dmigs pa yang ma yin no/ / nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pas/ nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa yang ma yin mi dmigs pa yang ma yin tan no// phyi stong pa nyid mi
238a4('bum): dmigs pas/ phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa ni/ pa yang ma yin mi dmigs pa yang ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs
238a5('bum): su med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa yang ma yin mi dmigs pa yang ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir
238a6('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa yang ma yin mi pa yang ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pas/ chen po stong pa nyid su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chen po stong pa
238a7('bum): nyid dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa yang ma yin mi dmigs pa yang ma yin no// don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa
238b1('bum): ni/ dmigs pa yang ma yin mi dmigs pa yang ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa yang ma
238b2('bum): yin mi dmigs pa yang ma yin no/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa yang ma yin mi
238b3('bum): dmigs pa yang ma yin no/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa yang ma

245a7('bum): kyi phyir sa drug pa su do/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa drug pa su do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa drug pa su do// dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa drug pa su
245b1('bum): do/ / dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa drug pa su do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa drug pa su do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa drug pa su do// nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun
245b2('bum): pa su do/ / phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa su do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa su do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa su do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa
245b3('bum): su do/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa su do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa su do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa su do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
245b4('bum): kyi phyir sa bdun pa su do/ / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa su do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa su do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa su
245b5('bum): do/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa su do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa su do// pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa su do// dngos po pa stong pa
245b6('bum): nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa su do/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa su do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bdun pa su do// nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa su do//
245b7('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa su do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa su do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa su do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa su
246a1('bum): do/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa su do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa su med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa su do// mtha'
246a2('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa su do/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa su do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa su do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir
246a3('bum): sa brgyad pa su do/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa su do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa dmigs su do// pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa su do//
246a4('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa su do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa su do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa brgyad pa su do// nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa
246a5('bum): dgu pa su do/ / phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa su do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa su do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa su do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir
246a6('bum): sa dgu pa su do/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa su do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa su do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa su do// mtha'
246a7('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa su do/ / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa su med do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa su do// rang bzhin stong pa
246b1('bum): nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa su do/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa su do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa su do// mi pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa su do//
246b2('bum): dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa su do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa su do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa su do// nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa
246b3('bum): su do/ / phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa su do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa su do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa su do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa su
246b4('bum): do/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa su do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa su do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa su do// mtha' las 'das pa
246b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa su do/ / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa su do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa su do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa
246b6('bum): su do/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa su do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa su do// pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa su do//
246b7('bum): dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa su do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa su do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa su do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
247a1('bum): 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa dang po su med pa ni/ / pa yang ma yin dmigs pa yang ma yin no// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa gnyis pa su pa ni/ pa yang ma yin
247a2('bum): pa yang ma yin no/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa gsum pa su med pa ni/ pa yang ma yin dmigs pa yang ma yin no// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa bzhi pa su pa ni/ dmigs pa yang ma yin
247a3('bum): pa yang ma yin no/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa lnga pa su pa ni/ pa yang ma yin pa yang ma yin no// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa drug pa su pa ni/ pa yang ma yin
247a4('bum): pa yang ma yin no/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa bdun pa su pa ni/ pa yang ma yin pa yang ma yin no// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa brgyad pa dmigs su pa ni/ pa yang ma
247a5('bum): yin pa yang ma yin no/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa dgu pa dmigs su pa ni/ pa yang ma yin pa yang ma yin no// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa bcu pa su pa ni/
247a6('bum): pa yang ma yin pa yang ma yin no// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ phyi
247a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba su do// shin tu rnam par dag
247b1('bum): pa nye bar bzung na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba su do// shin tu
247b2('bum): rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba
247b3('bum): su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
247b4('bum): nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba su do// shin tu rnam
247b5('bum): par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yongs su smyin par bya
247b6('bum): ba su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ rang gi mtshan
247b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba su do// shin
248a1('bum): tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs
248a2('bum): su smin par bya ba su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/
248a3('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba su do// shin tu rnam par
248a4('bum): dag pa nye bar bzung na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bya dmigs su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ stong po nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba
248a5('bum): su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs
248a6('bum): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byu ba su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar
248a7('bum): bzung na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
248b1('bum): par bya ba su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi
248b2('bum): phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/
248b3('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba su do//
248b4('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
248b5('bum): su dag par bya ba su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
248b6('bum): nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ lnga su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir lnga
248b7('bum): su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir lnga su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir lnga su do// shin tu rnam par dag
249a1('bum): pa nye bar bzung na/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir lnga su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir lnga su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ 'dus
249a2('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir lnga su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir lnga su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir lnga
249a3('bum): su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir lnga su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir lnga su med do// shin tu rnam
249a4('bum): par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir lnga su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir lnga su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ rang gi
249a5('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir lnga su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir lnga su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi
249a6('bum): phyir lnga su do/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir lnga su do// shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir lnga
249a7('bum): su do/ / rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad pa'i tshul gyis theg pa chen pos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
249b1('bum): gnas par 'gyur ro/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bcu'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgyad pa// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
249b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba ni/ lha dang dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ de'i slad du theg pa chen po zhes
249b3('bum): bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ ji ltar nam mkha' sems can grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i go 'byed pa de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di yang sems can grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i go 'byed
249b4('bum): pas bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po ste/ theg pa chen po de la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba'am/ gnas pa yang ma mchis sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
249b5('bum): dang / dbus zhes bgyi ba yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba yang ma mchis la/ gnas pa yang ma mchis pa de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di la yang 'gro ba
249b6('bum): / 'byung ba / gnas pa so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du/ sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' mi / dbus
249b7('bum): so/ / de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di yang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po 'di
250a1('bum): ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa bas/ de'i slad du theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa
250a2('bum): drug po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
250a3('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/
250a4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad de dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par rtse ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan
250a5('bum): dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
250a6('bum): nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu bde bar gnas pa'i ting nge
250a7('bum): 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po bde bar 'dzugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pas 'khrul pa par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
250b1('bum): brtson pa'i stobs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshig bla dwags la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge
250b2('bum): 'dzin dang / phyogs rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyam pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal po'i phyag rgya'i ting
250b3('bum): nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po'i dpal gyi
250b4('bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyun gyi rjes su song ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par rkyong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par glal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snrel zhi'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chags pa
250b5('bum): dang thogs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshol ba pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la rten pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
250b6('bum): bdud bzhi 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dag pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri
250b7('bum): ma pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'pham pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad pa dang bral ba'i
251a1('bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
251a2('bum): shes rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bya ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
251a3('bum): sems gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen mtha'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos dam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
251a4('bum): dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyis 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyis 'phags pas yongs su rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin po che nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / 'khrug pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i ting
251a5('bum): nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge mnyam par 'god pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
251a6('bum): pa gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ming dang mtshan ma la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bya ba dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin
251a7('bum): dang / gnas par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab rib pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / g.yo ba pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul las rgal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur
251b1('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i
251b2('bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / mtha' yas sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las 'da' ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yongs su gcod pa byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur rnam par sel ba'i ting nge
251b3('bum): 'dzin dang / gnas su bya ba pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gcig tu rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa 'dor ba pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
251b4('bum): spyod pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brda dang sgra la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la chags pa pa'i ting nge
251b5('bum): 'dzin dang / glog gi 'od zer bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra
251b6('bum): dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ma 'dres pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge
251b7('bum): 'dzin dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad shes pa'i za ma tog
252a1('bum): gi ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi blo gros kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
252a2('bum): mthun pa dang 'gal ba pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma par rgyas pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyan chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam
252a3('bum): pa thams cad du 'ong byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten thams cad skyob pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa par yang dag par
252a4('bum): gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas su pa la brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems pa'i ting nge
252a5('bum): 'dzin dang / snod las rang 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes chen po'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / stobs bcu'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgo rnam par 'byed pa'i ting nge
252a6('bum): 'dzin dang / lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ngag gi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge
252a7('bum): 'dzin dang / kun tu rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa pas/ rnam par grol zhing gos pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
252b1('bum): theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang
252b2('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos
252b3('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
252b4('bum): chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga
252b5('bum): dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
252b6('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi
252b7('bum): sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
253a1('bum): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ / rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa chen po de ni lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa ni/ lha dang / dang /
253a2('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs pa'i khams te/ rab 'byor gal te 'dod pa'i khams de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/
253a3('bum): phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing
253a4('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'dod pa'i khams de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir theg pa chen
253a5('bum): po 'dis lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyi khams de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden
253a6('bum): pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na no// theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar
253a7('bum): 'gyur te/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi khams de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/
253b1('bum): lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te gzugs pa'i khams de bzhin/ ma nor bde bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/
253b2('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang / lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor gzugs
253b3('bum): pa'i khams de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas
253b4('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ / rab 'byor gal te gzugs de bzhin// ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug
253b5('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor gzugs de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed
253b6('bum): pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab
253b7('bum): 'byor gal te tshor ba de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa
254a1('bum): chen po 'dis kyang / lha dang dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing
254a2('bum): brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te 'du shes de bzhin/ ma nor ba de
254a3('bum): bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang dang / lha ma yin
254a4('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'du shes de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po
254a5('bum): pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te 'du byed de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log
254a6('bum): ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar
254a7('bum): 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'du byed de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /
254b1('bum): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rnam par shes pa de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag
254b2('bum): cing brtan la ther zug 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags
254b3('bum): pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung
254b4('bum): ba yin no/ / rab 'byor gal te de bzhin/ ma nor bde bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na
254b5('bum): ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing brten la
254b6('bum): ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rna ba de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin
254b7('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas
255a1('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rna ba de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/
255a2('bum): dngos po pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te sna de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la
255a3('bum): bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur
255a4('bum): te/ rab 'byor sna de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang / lha ma
255a5('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ / rab 'byor gal te lce de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug
255a6('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lce de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su
255a7('bum): bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal
255b1('bum): te lus de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /
255b2('bum): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lus de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos
255b3('bum): can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te yid de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
255b4('bum): te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
255b5('bum): zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor yid de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir theg pa
255b6('bum): chen po 'dis lha dang / dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te gzugs de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/
255b7('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor
256a1('bum): gzugs de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang /
256a2('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te sgra de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan
256a3('bum): la ther zug 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sgra de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam
256a4('bum): par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis
256a5('bum): mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ / rab 'byor gal te dri de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi
256a6('bum): dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor dri de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su
256a7('bum): bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//
256b1('bum): rab 'byor gal te ro de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis
256b2('bum): kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor ro de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing brtan la ther zug ma yin
256b3('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te reg de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
256b4('bum): te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis
256b5('bum): mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor reg de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po
256b6('bum): 'dis lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te chos de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba
256b7('bum): bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor chos
