262b1('bum): chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'du byed de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing brtan la
262b2('bum): ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rnam par shes pa de bzhin/ ma
262b3('bum): nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther ther 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang
262b4('bum): dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing brtan la ther zug
262b5('bum): ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te dang gzugs de bzhin/ ma nor
262b6('bum): ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /
262b7('bum): dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor dang gzugs de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing brtan la ther zug
263a1('bum): ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te
263a2('bum): skye mched drug de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg
263a3('bum): pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor skye mched drug de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag
263a4('bum): cing brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te reg pa

263a6('bum): dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor reg pa de rnam par brtags pa rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur
263a7('bum): ba'i chos can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te tshor ba de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin
263b1('bum): pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
263b2('bum): zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir
263b3('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te sred pa de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la
263b4('bum): bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar
263b5('bum): 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sred pa de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha
263b6('bum): dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te len pa de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta
263b7('bum): ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor
264a1('bum): len pa de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing / brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang dang /
264a2('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te srid pa de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du

264a6('bum): ther zug 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor skye ba de rnam par
264a7('bum): brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing / brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du
264b1('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ / rab 'byor gal te rga shi de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug 'gyur ba'i
264b2('bum): chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rga shi de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs
264b3('bum): su bsgrubs pa ste/ rtag cing brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// //
264b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu dgu pa/ rab 'byor gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po pa ma yin ni/ theg nga chen po 'dis kyang lha
264b5('bum): dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyin theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang /

268a1('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te
268a2('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab
268a3('bum): 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dngos po la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te yang
268a4('bum): dag par spong ba rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab
268a5('bum): 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams dngos po la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rdzu 'phrul
268a6('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul
268a7('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams dngos po la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te dbang po rnams dngos po yod
268b1('bum): pa zhig yin te/ dngos po pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor dbang po rnams dngos po la dngos po ma yin pas/
268b2('bum): de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te stobs rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po
268b3('bum): 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor stobs rnams dngos po la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang / lha
268b4('bum): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ / rab 'byor gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma
268b5('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dngos po la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
268b6('bum): rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ / rab 'byor gal te lam dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing
268b7('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lam dngos po la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te 'phags
269a1('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'phags
269a2('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams dngos po la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te bsam gtan rnams dngos po yod

269b3('bum): zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ / rab 'byor gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas

269b5('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ / rab 'byor gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis

273b7('bum): rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ / rab 'byor gal te lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma
274a1('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dngos po la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha
274a2('bum): dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed phyin cad snying po byang chub tu 'dug gi bar du sems
274a3('bum): bskyed pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor
274a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed phyin cad snying po byang chub tu 'dug gi bar du sems bskyed pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag dngos po la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /
274a5('bum): dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa
274a6('bum): chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po la dngos po ma yin pas/
274a7('bum): de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu'i dngos po yod pa zhig
274b1('bum): yin te/ dngos po pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po par khong du chud cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par yang 'gyur/ lha dang /
274b2('bum): dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 'gyur te// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
274b3('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po par khong du chud de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'thob/ lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang zil kyis mnan cing
274b4('bum): 'byung ba yin no/ / rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po pa ma yin ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
274b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyis kyang lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing / gzi brjid dang dpal gyis lham mer 'gyur/ lhan ner 'gyur/ lhang nger 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
274b6('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dngos po la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis lha dang / dang /
274b7('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te/ gzi brjid dang dpal gyis lha ma me lhan ne lhang nger gyur pa yin no// rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od
275a1('bum): dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po pa ma yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs
275a2('bum): par mdzad de/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dngos po de/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
275a3('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs par mdzad do/ / rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa dngos po
275a4('bum): yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po pa ma yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gsung gis mngon par go bar yang mdzad de/
275a5('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa dngos po la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
275a6('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gsung gis mngon par go bar mdzad do/ / rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo
275a7('bum): dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po pa ma yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/
275b1('bum): sus kyang rung ste/ 'jig rten du chos dang ldan par bskor bar nus pa skor bar yang 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po de dngos po ma
275b2('bum): yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ sus kyang rung ste/ 'jig rten du chos dang
275b3('bum): ldan par bskor bar nus pa rab tu skor ro/ / rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gang gi don du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag dngos po yod pa zhig
275b4('bum): yin te/ dngos po pa ma yin na ni/ sems can de dag phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
275b5('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gang gi don du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag dngos po de/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir sems can rnams phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs
275b6('bum): su mya ngan las 'das so/ / yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o// yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o zhes smras pa ni de de bzhin no//
275b7('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam mo// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la ni shar phyogs su do// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / bla dang / 'og
276a1('bum): dang / phyogs mtshams su do// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la/ shar phyogs su do// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / bla dang / 'og dang / phyogs
276a2('bum): mtshams su de/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni ring po ma yin/ thung ngu ma yin/ zlum po ma yin/ gru bzhi ma yin/ mnyam pa ma yin/
276a3('bum): mnyam pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang ring po ma yin/ thung ngu ma yin/ zlum po ma yin/ gru bzhi ma yin/ mnyam pa ma yin/ mnyam pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes
276a4('bum): bya'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni sngon po ma yin/ ser po ma yin/ dmar po ma yin/ dkar po ma yin/ leb rgan ma yin/ shel dang dngul gyi kha dog du 'dug pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa
276a5('bum): chen po de yang sngon po ma yin/ ser po ma yin/ dmar po ma yin/ dkar po ma yin/ leb rgan ma yin/ shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o// rab 'byor
276a6('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ de'i
276a7('bum): phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la ni 'grib pa do// 'phel ba do// 'bri ba do// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang 'grib pa do// 'phel
276b1('bum): ba do/ / 'bri ba de/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la ni kun nas nyon mongs pa do// rnam par byang ba do// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la yang
276b2('bum): kun nas nyon rmongs pa / rnam par byang ba de/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la skye ba do// 'gag pa do// gnas pa do// mtha' thug pa do//
276b3('bum): gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba so// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la yang skye ba do// 'gag pa do// gnas pa do// mtha' thug pa do// gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba te/ de'i
276b4('bum): phyir theg pa de ni ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni dge ba ma yin/ dge ba ma yin/ lung du ma bstan pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang dge ba ma yin/
276b5('bum): dge ba ma yin/ lung du ma bstan pa ma yin te// de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni mthong ba ma yin/ thos pa ma yin/ rig pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma
276b6('bum): yin no/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang mthong ba ma yin/ thos pa ma yin/ rig pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
276b7('bum): dper na/ nam mkha' ni shes par bya ba yang ma yin/ shes par bya ba yang ma yin/ rnam par shes par bya ba yang ma yin/ yongs su shes par bya ba yang ma yin/ mngon du bya ba yang ma yin/ spang ba yang ma yin/ bsgom
277a1('bum): pa yang ma yin no/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang shes par bya ba yang ma yin/ shes par bya ba yang ma yin/ rnam par shes par bya ba yang ma yin/ yongs su shes par bya ba yang ma yin/ mngon du bya ba yang ma yin/ spang ba yang ma
277a2('bum): yin/ bsgom pa yang ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i ni rnam par smyin da pa yang ma yin/ rnam par
277a3('bum): smyind pa'i chos can yang ma yin no/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang rnam par smyind pa yang ma yin/ rnam par smyin pa'i chos can yang ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di
277a4('bum): lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin/ gzugs pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang
277a5('bum): 'dod pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin/ gzugs pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di
277a6('bum): lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni 'dod chags dang ldan pa ma yin/ 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin/ zhe sdang dang ldan pa ma yin/ zhe sdang dang bral ba ma yin/ gti mug dang ldan pa ma yin/ gti mug dang bral ba ma yin no//
277a7('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang 'dod chags dang ldan pa ma yin/ 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin/ zhe sdang dang ldan pa ma yin/ zhe sdang dang bral ba ma yin/ gti mug dang ldan pa ma yin/ gti mug dang bral ba
277b1('bum): ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sems dang po bskyed pa do// gnyis pa do// gsum pa do// bzhi pa do// lnga pa do//
277b2('bum): drug pa do// bdun pa do// brgyad pa do// dgu pa do// sems bcu pa bskyed pa do// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la yang sems dang po bskyed pa do// gnyis pa do// gsum pa med do//
277b3('bum): bzhi pa do// lnga pa do// drug pa do// bdun pa do// brgyad pa do// dgu pa do// sems bcu pa bskyed pa do// de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper
277b4('bum): na/ nam mkha' la ni dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa do// rigs kyi sa do// brgyad pa'i sa do// mthong ba'i sa do// bsrabs pa'i sa do// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa do// byas pa rtogs pa'i
277b5('bum): sa do/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la yang dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa do// rigs kyis do// brgyad pa'i sa do// mthong ba'i sa do// bsrabs pa'i sa do// 'dod chags dang bral
277b6('bum): ba'i sa do/ / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa do// de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
277b7('bum): 'bras bu do/ / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu do// dgra bcom pa nyid do// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la yang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu do// phyir 'ong
278a1('bum): ba'i 'bras bu do/ / dgra bcom pa nyid do// de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la ni nyan thos kyi sa do// rang sangs rgyas kyi sa do// byang chub sems dpa'i sa do//
278a2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa do// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la yang nyan thos kyi sa / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa / byang chub sems dpa'i sa / yang dag
278a3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa de/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni gzugs dang ldan pa ma yin/ gzugs pa ma yin/ bstan du yod pa ma yin
278a4('bum): bstan du pa ma yin/ thogs pa yod pa ma yin/ thogs pa pa ma yin/ ldan pa ma yin/ ldan pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gzugs dang ldan pa ma yin/ gzugs pa ma yin/ bstan tu yod pa ma yin/
278a5('bum): bstan tu pa ma yin/ thogs pa yod pa ma yin/ thogs pa pa ma yin/ ldan pa ma yin/ ldan pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta
278a6('bum): ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni rtag pa ma yin/ rtag pa ma yin/ bde ba ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba ma yin/ bdag yod pa ma yin/ bdag pa ma yin/ sdug pa ma yin sdug pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa
278a7('bum): chen po de yang rtag pa ma yin/ rtag pa ma yin/ bde ba ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba ma yin/ bdag yod pa ma yin/ bdag pa ma yin/ sdug pa ma yin/ sdug pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang
278b1('bum): mnyam zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni stong pa ma yin/ stong pa ma yin/ mtshan ma yod pa ma yin/ mtshan ma pa ma yin/ smon pa yod pa ma yin/ smon pa pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg
278b2('bum): pa chen po de yang stong pa ma yin/ stong pa ma yin/ mtshan ma yod pa ma yin/ mtshan ma pa ma yin/ smon pa yod pa ma yin/ smon pa pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o// rab 'byor
278b3('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni zhi ba ma yin/ ma zhi ba ma yin/ dben pa ma yin/ dben pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang zhi ba ma yin/ ma zhi ba ma yin/ dben pa ma yin/ dben pa ma yin te/ de'i
278b4('bum): phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni snang ba ma yin/ mun pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang snang ba ma yin/ mun pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir
278b5('bum): theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni su yod pa yang ma yin/ su pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang su yod pa
278b6('bum): yang ma yin/ su pa yang ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni brjod du yod pa yang ma yin/ brjod du pa yang ma yin no//
278b7('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang brjod du yod pa yang ma yin/ brjod du pa yang ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o// rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang
279a1('bum): mnyam pa ste/ 'di ltar theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du ji ltar nam mkha' sems can tshad grangs pa'i go 'byed pa de bzhin du/ theg pa chen po de yang sems can tshad
279a2('bum): grangs pa'i go 'byed do/ / zhes smras pa ni/ de de bzhin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ ji ltar nam mkha' sems can tshad grangs pa'i go 'byed pa de bzhin du/ theg pa chen po de yang sems can tshad grangs
279a3('bum): pa'i go 'byed do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sems can pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' par rig par bya'o// nam mkha' pa'i phyir theg pa chen po par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang
279a4('bum): theg pa chen po de sems can tshad grangs pa'i go 'byed do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar sems can gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang
279a5('bum): su pa'i phyir ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sems can tshad pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' tshad par rig par bya'o// nam mkha' tshad pa'i phyir/ theg pa chen po tshad par rig par bya ste/
279a6('bum): rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad grangs pa'i go 'byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar sems can gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen
279a7('bum): po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang su pa'i phyir ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sems can dpag tu pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' dpag tu par rig par bya'o// nam mkha' dpag tu pa'i phyir/ theg
279b1('bum): pa chen po dpag tu par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad grangs pa'i go 'byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar sems can gang yin pa dang / nam
279b2('bum): mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang su pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang sems can pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings par rig par bya'o// chos kyi dbyings pa'i
279b3('bum): phyir nam mkha' par rig par bya'o/ / nam mkha' par phyir/ theg pa chen po par rig par bya'o// theg pa chen po pa'i phyir 'jal ba par rig par bya'o// 'jal ba pa'i phyir/ 'grangs pa
279b4('bum): par rig par bya'o/ / 'grangs pa pa'i phyir/ dpogs pa par rig par bya'o// dpogs pa pa'i phyir chos thams cad par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de
279b5('bum): sems can tshad grangs pa'i go 'byed do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar sems can gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /
279b6('bum): 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang su pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang sems can pa'i
279b7('bum): phyir/ de bzhin nyid par rig par bya'o// de bzhin nyid med pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' par rig par bya'o// nam mkha' pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o// theg pa chen po pa'i phyir 'jal ba
280a1('bum): par rig par bya'o/ / 'jal ba pa'i phyir 'grangs pa par rig par bya'o// 'grangs pa pa'i phyir dpogs pa par rig par bya'o// dpogs pa pa'i phyir/ chos thams
280a2('bum): cad par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po des sems can tshad grangs pa'i go 'byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar sems can gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang
280a3('bum): yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams
280a4('bum): cad kyang su pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag pa'i phyir/ sems can par rig par bya'o// sems can pa'i phyir srog par rig par bya'o// srog pa'i phyir 'gro ba par
280a5('bum): rig par bya'o/ / 'gro ba pa'i phyir gso ba par rig par bya'o// gso ba pa'i phyir skyes bu par rig par bya'o// skyes bu pa'i phyir gang zag par rig par bya'o// gang zag pa'i phyir shed
280a6('bum): can par rig par bya'o/ / shed can pa'i phyir shed bdag par rig par bya'o// shed bdag pa'i phyir byed pa po par rig par bya'o// byed pa po pa'i phyir tshor ba po par rig par bya'o//
280a7('bum): tshor ba po pa'i phyir shes pa po par rig par bya'o// shes pa po pa'i phyir mthong ba po par rig par bya'o// mthong ba po pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' par rig par bya'o// yang dag pa'i mtha'
280b1('bum): pa'i phyir nam mkha' par rig par bya'o/ / nam mkha' pa'i phyir theg pa chen po par rig par bya'o// theg pa chen po pa'i phyir 'jal ba par rig par bya'o// 'jal ba pa'i phyir 'grangs pa par rig
280b2('bum): par bya'o/ / 'grangs pa pa'i phyir da pogs pa par rig par bya'o// dpogs pa pa'i phyir chos thams cad par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad grangs pa'i
280b3('bum): go 'byed do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso ba gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin

280b5('bum): mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang su pa'i
280b6('bum): phyir ro/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag pa'i phyir/ sems can par rig par bya'o// sems can pa'i
280b7('bum): phyir srog par rig par bya'o/ / srog pa'i phyir 'gro ba par rig par bya'o// 'gro ba pa'i phyir gso ba par rig par bya'o// gso ba pa'i phyir skyes bu par rig par bya'o// skyes bu
281a1('bum): pa'i phyir gang zag par rig par bya'o/ / gang zag pa'i phyir shed can par rig par bya'o// shed can pa'i phyir shed bdag par rig par bya'o// shed bdag pa'i phyir byed pa po par rig par
281a2('bum): bya'o/ / byed pa po pa'i phyir tshor ba po par rig par bya'o// tshor ba po pa'i phyir shes pa po par rig par bya'o// shes po po pa'i phyir mthong ba po par rig par bya'o// mthong ba po pa'i phyir bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings par rig
281a3('bum): par bya'o/ / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings pa'i phyir gzugs par rig par bya'o// gzugs pa'i phyir tshor ba par rig par bya'o// tshor ba pa'i phyir 'du shes par rig par bya'o// 'du shes pa'i phyir 'du byed par rig par bya'o// 'du
281a4('bum): byed pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa par rig par bya'o/ / rnam par shes pa pa'i phyir nam mkha' par rig par bya'o// nam mkha' pa'i phyir theg pa chen po par rig par bya'o// theg pa chen po pa'i phyir

319b1('bum): na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i 'du byed par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa ni 'das pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa su de/
319b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas su na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/
319b3('bum): stong pa nyid lam 'ongs pa'i gzugs su de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas su na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i tshor
319b4('bum): ba ni/ ma 'ongs pa'i tshor bas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba su de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas su na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba
319b5('bum): par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i 'du shes ni ma 'ongs pa'i 'du shes kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du shes su de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas
319b6('bum): su na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du shes par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed ni ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed
319b7('bum): su de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas su na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i
320a1('bum): rnam par shes pas stong ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid lam 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa su de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas su na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i
320a2('bum): rnam par shes pa par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la de ltar byung ba'i gzugs su de/ stong pa nyid kyang
320a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis stong pas su na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba ni da ltar byung ba'i tshor bas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la
320a4('bum): da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba su de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas su na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes ni da
320a5('bum): ltar byung ba'i 'du shes kyis stong ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes su de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas su na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes
320a6('bum): par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed ni du ltar byung ba'i 'du byed kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed su de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa
320a7('bum): nyid kyis stong pas su na/ stong po nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo // de ci'i
320b1('bum): phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa su de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas su na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig
320b2('bum): smos/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum
320b3('bum): mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la de ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam
320b4('bum): pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
320b5('bum): ni sngon gyi mthar / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la
320b6('bum): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la
320b7('bum): na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
321a1('bum): pa ni/ sngon gyi mthar / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ phyi ma'i mthar / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ da ltar byung bar mi / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
321a2('bum): pa ni/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa
321a3('bum): nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
321a4('bum): phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de ltar byung bar / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la
321a5('bum): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/
321a6('bum): mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar /
321a7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
321b1('bum): 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid la yang mnyam pa nyid na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das
321b2('bum): pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
321b3('bum): phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus
321b4('bum): / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid la yang mnyam pa nyid na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig
321b5('bum): smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar dmigs/ nang stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar / nang stong pa
321b6('bum): nyid ni da ltar byung bar / nang stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam
321b7('bum): pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung
322a1('bum): ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar / phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar / phyi stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar / phyi stong pa nyid ni
322a2('bum): dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/
322a3('bum): mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor
322a4('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar / phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar / phyi nang stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar / phyi nang stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
322a5('bum): mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i
322a6('bum): dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni
322a7('bum): phyi ma'i mthar / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus /
322b1('bum): mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs
322b2('bum): pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar / chen po stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar / chen po stong pa
322b3('bum): nyid ni da ltar byung bar / chen po stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus /
322b4('bum): mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung
322b5('bum): ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar / don dam pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar / don dam pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar / don dam pa stong pa
322b6('bum): nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang
322b7('bum): te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig
323a1('bum): smos/ rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni dus
323a2('bum): gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam
323a3('bum): pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor 'dus
323a4('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la
323a5('bum): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa
323a6('bum): nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor mtha' las 'das
323a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni
323b1('bum): dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/
323b2('bum): mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor
323b3('bum): thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ni sdon gyi mthar dmigs/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ni
323b4('bum): dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa
323b5('bum): nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor dor ba pa
323b6('bum): stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar / dor ba pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar / dor ba pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi / dor ba pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/
323b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la
324a1('bum): na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid
324a2('bum): ni sngon gyi mthar / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
324a3('bum): rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la/ 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la/ da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang
324a4('bum): mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor chos thams cad
324a5('bum): stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la
324a6('bum): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam
324a7('bum): pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid
324b1('bum): stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la
324b2('bum): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi
324b3('bum): na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor pa stong pa nyid ni sngon
324b4('bum): gyi mthar / pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar / pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar / pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de
324b5('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid
324b6('bum): la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor dngos po pa stong pa
324b7('bum): nyid ni sngon gyi mthar / dngos po pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar dmigs/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar / dngos po pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la
325a1('bum): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi te/ mnyam
325a2('bum): pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ngo bo nyid
325a3('bum): stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar dmigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar dmigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
325a4('bum): rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi na/ mnyam
325a5('bum): pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi
325a6('bum): mthar dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum
325a7('bum): mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la de ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/
325b1('bum): mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor
325b2('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dus
325b3('bum): gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang
325b4('bum): te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/
325b5('bum): rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams ni sngon gyi mthar yang dag par spong ba rnams ni/ phyi ma'i mthar mi / yang dag par spong ba rnams ni da ltar byung bar / yang dag par spong ba rnams ni dus gsum
325b6('bum): mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/
325b7('bum): mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/
326a1('bum): rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni sdon gyi mthar / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar / rdzu 'phrul gyi
326a2('bum): rkang pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus
326a3('bum): kyang mi te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta
326a4('bum): yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor dbang po rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi / dbang po rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar / dbang po rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ dbang po rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi
326a5('bum): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi te/ mnyam pa nyid
326a6('bum): kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab
326a7('bum): 'byor stobs rnams ni sngon gyi mthar / stobs rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi / stobs rnams ni da ltar byung bar / stobs rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir
326b1('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam
326b2('bum): pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni sngon gyi mthar / byang
326b3('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni da ltar byung bar / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la/ te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
326b4('bum): rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la/ 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la/ da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang
326b5('bum): mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor
326b6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni sngon gyi mthar / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni phyi ma'i mthar / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni da ltar byung bar / 'phags
326b7('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa
327a1('bum): nyid la/ da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa
327a2('bum): lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar / 'phags pa'i
327a3('bum): bden pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs
327a4('bum): pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci
327a5('bum): zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams ni sngon gyi mthar / bsam gtan rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar / bsam gtan rnams ni da ltar byung bar /
327a6('bum): bsam gtan rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i
327a7('bum): dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus
327b1('bum): pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor tshad pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar / tshad pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar / tshad pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar / tshad pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la
327b2('bum): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam
327b3('bum): pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor gzugs pa'i snyoms
327b4('bum): par 'jug pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar / gzugs
327b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la
327b6('bum): da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i
327b7('bum): dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad ni sngon gyi mthar / rnam par thar pa brgyad ni phyi ma'i mthar / rnam par thar pa brgyad ni da ltar byung bar /
328a1('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid
328a2('bum): la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i
328a3('bum): dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni sngon gyi mthar / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni phyi ma'i mthar / mthar kyis
328a4('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni da ltar byung bar / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i
328a5('bum): dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus
328a6('bum): pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ni sngon
328a7('bum): gyi mthar / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ni phyi ma'i mthar / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ni da
328b1('bum): ltar byung bar / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang smon pa pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam
328b2('bum): pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus
328b3('bum): pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar / mngon par shes pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar / mngon par shes pa
328b4('bum): rnams ni da ltar byung bar / mngon par shes pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus
328b5('bum): / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig
328b6('bum): smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams ni sngon gyi mthar / ting nge 'dzin rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar / ting nge 'dzin rnams ni da ltar byung bar / ting
328b7('bum): nge 'dzin rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i
329a1('bum): dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa
329a2('bum): lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni sngon gyi mthar / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni da ltar byung bar / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid
329a3('bum): la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa
329a4('bum): nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
329a5('bum): bcu ni sngon gyi mthar / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni phyi ma'i mthar / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni de ltar byung bar / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni dus gsum mnyam pa
329a6('bum): nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi te/ mnyam pa nyid
329a7('bum): kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor 'jigs pa bzhi ni
329b1('bum): sngon gyi mthar / 'jigs pa bzhi ni phyi ma'i mthar / 'jigs pa bzhi ni da ltar byung bar / 'jigs pa bzhi ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa
329b2('bum): la 'das pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa
329b3('bum): lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni sngon gyi mthar / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni phyi
329b4('bum): ma'i mthar / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni da ltar byung bar / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus
329b5('bum): / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus / mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/
329b6('bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni sngon gyi mthar / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni
329b7('bum): phyi ma'i mthar / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni da ltar byung bar / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyan
330a1('bum): pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi / mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la na/ mnyam pa
330a2('bum): nyid la 'das pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi mthar / so
330a3('bum): so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mthar / so so'i skye bo ni da ltar byung bar / so so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can su pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzhan
330a4('bum): yang nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar mi / nyan thos ni phyi ma'i mthar mi / nyan thos ni da ltar byung bar mi / nyan thos ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su pa'i phyir
330a5('bum): ro/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas ni sngon gyi mthar rang sangs rgyas ni phyi ma'i mthar rang sangs rgyas ni da ltar byung bar / rang sangs rgyas ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can
330a6('bum): su pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar / byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar / byang chub sems dpa' ni da ltar byung bar / byang chub
330a7('bum): sems dpa' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can su pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi / de bzhin gshegs pa ni
330b1('bum): phyi ma'i mthar / de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar byung bar / de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de ltar byang
330b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
330b3('bum): chen po'i theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
330b4('bum): ngo / / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba
330b5('bum): 'di/ legs par gsungs pa ni legs shing dge ste/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo// bcom ldan
330b6('bum): 'das ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshad
330b7('bum): dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na/ dpag tu ma mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis pa rnams kyang theg pa chen po 'di nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
331a1('bum): de'i slad du dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di
331a2('bum): skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
331a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes par gyur to/ / brnyes so brnyes par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha tu pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bcu gcig go// /
331a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu gsum pa/ de nas byams gang gi bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni/ de bzhin
331a5('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du/ bsko ba mdzad pas/ 'di ni theg pa chen po bstan pa tsam du sems so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom
331a6('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gam/ gcig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'gal bar theg pa chen po bstan par ma gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
331a7('bum): 'byor de ltar gyur pa yang de/ rab 'byor khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun par theg pa chen po ston to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar dge ba'i chos gang yang rung ste/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang
331b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud do// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das dge
331b2('bum): ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud pa/ de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag gang lags
331b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags
331b4('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par
331b5('bum): 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
331b6('bum): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
331b7('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid
332a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang
332a2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
332a3('bum): brgyad dang / nyam pa'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms kyi rnam par spyod pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud par 'dod pa ste/
332a4('bum): nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos so// rab 'byor de la theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bsam
332a5('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa

338a2('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ 'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/
338a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ gzugs
338a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang cing pa yin/ tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang cing pa yin/ 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang cing
338a5('bum): pa yin/ 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang cing pa yin/ rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang cing pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i
338a6('bum): phyir na/ de skad du de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi
338a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ril kyis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma na/ byang chub sems
338b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes sa smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
338b2('bum): bgyi ba 'di ni tsam du bas so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du ji ltar bdag bdag ces bgyi yang / bdag ni mngon par grub pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang
338b3('bum): chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi yang byang chub sems dpa' ni mngon par grub pa ma mchis so/ / de ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin la/ gzugs mngon par grub pa lta yang gang zhig mchis/ tshor ba mngon par
338b4('bum): grub pa lta yang gang zhig mchis/ 'du shes mngon par grub pa lta yang gang zhig mchis/ 'du byed mngon par grub pa lta yang gang zhig mchis/ rnam par shes pa mngon par grub pa lta yang gang zhig mchis te/ gang mngon par ma
338b5('bum): grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/ / gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba ma lags so// gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du shes ma lags so// gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du byed ma lags so// gang mngon par ma grub pa
338b6('bum): de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so/ / zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du mngon par ma grub pa zhig/ mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'am
338b7('bum): zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du mngon par ma grub pa las gud na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba su ma mchis so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de
339a1('bum): skad du gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems 'jum yongs su 'jum 'gyod par 'gyur zhing / yid 'jigs sngang skrag par 'gyur na/ byang chub sems
339a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes smra/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can
339a3('bum): med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// tshe
339a4('bum): dang ldan pa sha ra du ti'i bu sems can pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
339a5('bum): phyi ma'i mthar so/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sems can pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
339a6('bum): dbus su so/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can pa dang / sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin pa la sngon gyi mtha'
339a7('bum): so/ / phyi ma'i mtha' so// dbus so// sems can pa yang gzhan/ sems can stong pa yang gzhan/ sems can dben pa yang gzhan/ sems can rang bzhin pa yang gzhan zhig la
339b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhig ste/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan/ dbus kyang gzhan zhes bya ba de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sems can pa gang yin pa dang / sems can stong pa gang yin
339b2('bum): pa dang / sems can dben pa gang yin pa dang / sems can rang bzhin pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang
339b3('bum): gnyis su de gnyis su byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so//
339b4('bum): gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// gzugs ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// gzugs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
339b5('bum): so/ / gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// gzugs ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang
339b6('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ / gzugs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// gzugs
339b7('bum): dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// gzugs ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs pa dang /
340a1('bum): gzugs stong pa nyid dang / gzugs dben pa dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ gzugs pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs stong pa
340a2('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus
340a3('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ gzugs pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gzugs dben pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems
340a4('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa dang sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba pa'i phyir/ byang

340b1('bum): dpa' dbus su so/ / tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub
340b2('bum): sems dpa' dbus su so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba pa dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / tshor ba dben pa dang / tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha'
340b3('bum): / dbus te/ tshor ba pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma

340b5('bum): dben pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa/ de thams cad kyang gnyis
340b6('bum): su de gnyis su byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sdon gyi mthar mi

341a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// 'du shes dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar

342b4('bum): par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do//

343a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so/ / stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su phyi ma'i mthar so// ngo bo nyid
343a2('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi
