343b3('bum): sems dpa' dbus su so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba pa dang / rna ba stong pa nyid dang / rna ba dben pa dang / rna ba ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha'

343b6('bum): nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang
343b7('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sdon gyi mthar so// sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// sna dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
344a1('bum): gyi mthar so/ / sna ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// sna pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
344a2('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so/ / sna dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// sna ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// sna pa'i phyir byang
344a3('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su so/ / sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// sna dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// sna ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir byang chub
344a4('bum): sems dpa' dbus su so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna pa dang / sna stong pa nyid dang / sna dben pa dang / sna ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha'
344a5('bum): / dbus te/ sna pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sna stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sna dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sna ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/
344a6('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na sna pa gang yin pa dang / sna stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sna dben pa gang yin
344a7('bum): pa dang / sna ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su
344b1('bum): byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lce pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// lce dben pa'i phyir byang chub
344b2('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / lce ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// lce pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
344b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// lce dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// lce ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// lce pa'i
344b4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dpa' dbus su so/ / lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// lce dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// lce ngo bo nyid pa'i
344b5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce pa dang / lci stong pa nyid dang / lce dben pa dang / lci ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha'
344b6('bum): / dbus te/ lce pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lce dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma
344b7('bum): yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na lce pa gang yin pa dang / lce stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce
345a1('bum): dben pa gang yin pa dang / lce ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad
345a2('bum): kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// lus stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
345a3('bum): so/ / lus dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// lus ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// lus pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
345a4('bum): so/ / lus stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// lus dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// lus ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
345a5('bum): ma'i mthar so/ / lus pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// lus stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// lus dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
345a6('bum): dbus su so/ / lus ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus pa dang / lus stong pa nyid dang / lus dben pa dang /
345a7('bum): lus ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ lus pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lus dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus ngo bo
345b1('bum): nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na lus pa gang
345b2('bum): yin pa dang / lus stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus
345b3('bum): gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// yid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar

345b6('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ / yid pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// yid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// yid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'

346a1('bum): ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ yid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid ngo bo nyid
346a2('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na yid pa
346a3('bum): gang yin pa dang / yid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yid dben pa gang yin pa dang / yid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa
346a4('bum): dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyer bzhi pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
346a5('bum): bu gzugs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sdon
346a6('bum): gyi mthar so/ / gzugs ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// gzugs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// gzugs stong
346a7('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// gzugs ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'

346b3('bum): pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ gzugs pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs ngo bo nyid

347a6('bum): dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sgra pa gang yin pa dang / sgra stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sgra dben pa gang yin pa dang / sgra ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi
347a7('bum): ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dri pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// dri stong pa nyid

347b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dri dben pa dang / dri ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ dri pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dri stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ dri dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dri ngo
347b6('bum): bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na dri pa gang yin
347b7('bum): pa dang / dri stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dri dben pa gang yin pa dang / dri ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /

348b1('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ro dben pa gang yin pa dang / ro ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang

349a3('bum): gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'

349b1('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos pa dang / chos stong pa nyid dang / chos dben pa dang / chos ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha'
349b2('bum): / dbus te/ chos pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chos stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chos dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chos ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/

349b4('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / chos ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su
349b5('bum): de gnyis su byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gi rnam par shes pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
349b6('bum): sngon gyi mthar so/ / gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'/ sngon gyi mthar so// gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
349b7('bum): mthar so/ / gi rnam par shes pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'/ phyi ma'i mthar so// gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
350a1('bum): so/ / gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
350a2('bum): mthar so/ / gi rnam par shes pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so//
350a3('bum): gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha
350a4('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ gi rnam par shes pa pa dang / gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / gi rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha'
350a5('bum): / dbus te/ gi rnam par shes pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ gi rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gi rnam par shes pa
350a6('bum): ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar
350a7('bum): na/ gi rnam par shes pa pa gang yin pa dang / gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gi rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang /
350b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i rnam
350b2('bum): par shes pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir
350b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi
350b4('bum): ma'i mthar so/ / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so//
350b5('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong
350b6('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub
350b7('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i rnam par shes pa pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rna
351a1('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa
351a2('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/
351a3('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam
351a4('bum): par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang
351a5('bum): yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i rnam par shes pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// sna'i rnam par shes pa
351a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid
351a7('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// sna'i rnam par shes pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi
351b1('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
351b2('bum): phyi ma'i mthar so/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// sna'i
351b3('bum): rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
351b4('bum): ti'i bu sna'i rnam par shes pa pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi / phyi ma'i mtha' /
351b5('bum): dbus te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa yang
351b6('bum): gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ sna'i rnam par
351b7('bum): shes pa pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang
352a1('bum): yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i rnam par shes pa
352a2('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
352a3('bum): sngon gyi mthar so/ / lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// lce'i rnam par shes pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar dmigs
352a4('bum): so/ / lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// lce'i rnam par shes pa
352a5('bum): ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// lce'i rnam par shes pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
352a6('bum): sems dpa' dbus su so/ / lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
352a7('bum): so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i rnam par shes pa pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa la
352b1('bum): sngon gyi mtha'i / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa yang
352b2('bum): gzhan ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang
352b3('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ lce'i rnam par shes pa pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa gang
352b4('bum): yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de/ gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha
352b5('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// lus kyi rnam
352b6('bum): par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// lus kyi rnam
352b7('bum): par shes pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/
353a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub
353a2('bum): sems dpa' dbus su so/ / lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// lus kyi
353a3('bum): rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi rnam par shes pa pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi rnam
353a4('bum): par shes pa dben pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa
353a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma
353a6('bum): yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na lus kyi rnam par shes pa pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
353a7('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus
353b1('bum): gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam par shes pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
353b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sdon gyi mthar so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
353b3('bum): mthar so/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so//
353b4('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// yid kyi rnam par
353b5('bum): shes pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang
353b6('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su so/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam
353b7('bum): par shes pa pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' /
354a1('bum): dbus te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi
354a2('bum): rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha
354a3('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin
354a4('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gi
354a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/
354a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// gi 'dus te reg pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
354a7('bum): mthar so/ / gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so//
354b1('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// gi 'dus te reg pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
354b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
354b3('bum): so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gi 'dus te/ reg pa pa dang / gi 'dus te/ reg pa stong pa nyid dang / gi 'dus te/ reg pa dben pa dang / gi 'dus te/ reg pa ngo bo
354b4('bum): nyid pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ gi 'dus te reg pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ gi 'dus te reg
354b5('bum): pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma
354b6('bum): yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ gi 'dus te reg pa pa gang yin pa dang / gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid
354b7('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de/ gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa
355a1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so//
355a2('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
355a3('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
355a4('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
355a5('bum): so/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg
355a6('bum): pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i 'dus te
355a7('bum): reg pa dben pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa
355b1('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang
355b2('bum): gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa
355b3('bum): dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su
355b4('bum): de gnyis su byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems
355b5('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
355b6('bum): so/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// sna'i
355b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa
356a1('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang
356a2('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su so/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa pa dang /
356a3('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa
356a4('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang
356a5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te
356a6('bum): reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i
356a7('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
356b1('bum): so/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sdon gyi mthar so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo
356b2('bum): nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
356b3('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
356b4('bum): mthar so/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// lce'i 'dus
356b5('bum): te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
356b6('bum): bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus
356b7('bum): te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma
357a1('bum): yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ lce'i
357a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa
357a3('bum): dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
357a4('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
357a5('bum): so/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so//
357a6('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// lus kyi 'dus te
357a7('bum): reg pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi
357b1('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus
357b2('bum): su so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa
357b3('bum): la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa
357b4('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin
357b5('bum): no/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
357b6('bum): ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe
357b7('bum): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
358a1('bum): so/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
358a2('bum): so/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// yid kyi
358a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
358a4('bum): med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
358a5('bum): dpa' dbus su so/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa pa dang / yid
358a6('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg
358a7('bum): pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems
358b1('bum): dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te
358b2('bum): reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i
358b3('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
358b4('bum): so/ / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen da kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon
358b5('bum): gyi mthar so/ / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen da kyis tshor ba pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
358b6('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang
358b7('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa'i
359a1('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
359a2('bum): tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha
359a3('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa dang / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid
359a4('bum): pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus mi te/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
359a5('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/
359a6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa gang yin pa dang / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa
359a7('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon
359b1('bum): gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa'i phyir
359b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i
359b3('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
359b4('bum): tshor ba pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rna ba'i 'dus te
359b5('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
359b6('bum): so/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
359b7('bum): dbus su so/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub
360a1('bum): sems dpa' dbus su so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid
360a2('bum): dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi / phyi ma'i mtha' mi / dbus mi te/ rna ba'i
360a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i
360a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan pa yin no// tshe
360a5('bum): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
360a6('bum): ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus
360a7('bum): gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// sna'i
360b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// sna'i 'dus te
360b2('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// sna'i 'dus
360b3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// sna'i
360b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// sna'i
360b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// sna'i
360b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa dang / sna'i
360b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha'
361a1('bum): / dbus te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
361a2('bum): ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/
361a3('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg
361a4('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa
361a5('bum): dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
361a6('bum): so/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
361a7('bum): sngon gyi mthar so/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa'i phyir/ byang
361b1('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i
361b2('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
361b3('bum): ba pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
361b4('bum): tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
361b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang / lce'i 'dus
361b6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus
361b7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang
362a1('bum): chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ lce'i
362a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
362a3('bum): kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su
362a4('bum): byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa
362a5('bum): nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// lus kyi 'dus te reg
362a6('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
362a7('bum): so/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
362b1('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa'i phyir/ byang chub
362b2('bum): sems dpa' dbus su so/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub
362b3('bum): sems dpa' dbus su so/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg
362b4('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa la sngon
362b5('bum): gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' dbus te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
362b6('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha'
362b7('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi
363a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang /
363a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi
363a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so//
363a4('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so//
363a5('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
363a6('bum): so/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid
363a7('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// yid kyi 'dus te reg
363b1('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
363b2('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
363b3('bum): tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ yid
363b4('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus
363b5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan
363b6('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa gang
363b7('bum): yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa
364a1('bum): de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu lnga pa// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
364a2('bum): sa'i khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
364a3('bum): sngon gyi mthar so/ / sa'i khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// sa'i khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// sa'i
364a4('bum): khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// sa'i khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang
364a5('bum): chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar mi so/ / sa'i khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
364a6('bum): so/ / sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// sa'i khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan
364a7('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sa'i khams pa dang / sa'i khams stong pa nyid dang / sa'i khams dben pa dang / sa'i khams ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus mi te/
364b1('bum): sa'i khams pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sa'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sa'i khams ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/
364b2('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ sa'i khams pa gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa
364b3('bum): dang / sa'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang
364b4('bum): yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chu'i khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir
364b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so/ / chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// chu'i khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
364b6('bum): sngon gyi mthar so/ / chu'i khams med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
364b7('bum): so/ / chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// chu'i khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// chu'i khams
365a1('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
365a2('bum): dbus su so/ / chu'i khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chu'i khams pa dang / chu'i khams stong pa nyid dang /
365a3('bum): chu'i khams dben pa dang / chu'i khams ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus mi te/ chu'i khams pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma
365a4('bum): yin/ chu'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/
365a5('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ chu'i khams pa gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams ngo bo
365a6('bum): nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do//
365a7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sdon gyi mthar so//
365b1('bum): khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
365b2('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so/ / khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so//
365b3('bum): khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// me'i khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
365b4('bum): sems dpa' dbus su so/ / khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so//
365b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ khams pa dang / khams stong pa nyid dang / khams dben pa dang / khams ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi / phyi ma'i mtha'
365b6('bum): / dbus te/ khams pa yang gzhan ma yin/ khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ khams ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/
365b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ khams pa gang
366a1('bum): yin pa dang / khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / khams ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi
366a2('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rlung gi khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
366a3('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
366a4('bum): so/ / rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rlung gi khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so//
366a5('bum): rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rlung gi khams ngo bo
366a6('bum): nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rlung gi khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang
366a7('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so/ / rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
366b1('bum): so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rlung gi khams pa dang / rlung gi khams stong pa nyid dang / rlung gi khams dben pa dang / rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha'
366b2('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ rlung gi khams med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid pa
366b3('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ rlung gi
366b4('bum): khams pa gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon
366b5('bum): gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam mkha'i khams pa'i phyir/
366b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
366b7('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// nam mkha'i khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi
367a1('bum): ma'i mthar so/ / nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
367a2('bum): phyi ma'i mthar so/ / nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// nam mkha'i khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
367a3('bum): so/ / nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// nam mkha'i
367a4('bum): khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam mkha'i khams pa dang / nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid dang /
367a5('bum): nam mkha'i khams dben pa dang / nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ nam mkha'i khams pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nam
367a6('bum): mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi
367a7('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ nam mkha'i khams pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams stong pa
367b1('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang
367b2('bum): yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par shes pa'i khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so//
367b3('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rnam
367b4('bum): par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rnam par shes pa'i khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rnam par shes
367b5('bum): pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rnam par shes pa'i
367b6('bum): khams ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rnam par shes pa'i khams pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rnam par shes pa'i
367b7('bum): khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rnam par shes pa'i khams
368a1('bum): ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par shes pa'i khams pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa
368a2('bum): nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' mi / dbus mi te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams pa yang
368a3('bum): gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems
368a4('bum): dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams pa gang yin pa dang
368a5('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi
368a6('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma rig pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
368a7('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// ma rig pa
368b1('bum): ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// ma rig pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
368b2('bum): so/ / ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// ma rig pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// ma rig pa pa'i phyir/
368b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// ma rig pa ngo bo nyid
368b4('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma rig pa pa dang / ma rig pa stong pa nyid dang / ma rig pa dben pa dang / ma rig pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon
368b5('bum): gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus mi te/ ma rig pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa ngo bo nyid pa yang
368b6('bum): gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ ma rig pa pa
368b7('bum): gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi
369a1('bum): ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du byed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
369a2('bum): so/ / 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/

369a5('bum): dbus su so/ / 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/
369a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed dben pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha'

369b4('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang
