375a2('bum): ba ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// skye ba pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// skye ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
375a3('bum): so/ / skye ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// skye ba ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye ba
375a4('bum): pa dang / skye ba stong pa nyid dang / skye ba dben pa dang / skye ba ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ skye ba pa yang gzhan ma yin/ skye ba stong pa nyid kyang
375a5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ skye ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ skye ba ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus
375a6('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ skye ba pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / skye ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub
375a7('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rga shi
375b1('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rga shi dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
375b2('bum): so/ / rga shi ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rga shi pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang
375b3('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ / rga shi dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rga shi ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so//
375b4('bum): rga shi pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rga shi dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
375b5('bum): so/ / rga shi ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rga shi pa dang / rga shi stong pa nyid dang / rga shi dben pa dang / rga shi ngo
375b6('bum): bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' mi / dbus te/ rga shi pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/
375b7('bum): rga shi ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
376a1('bum): dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ rga shi pa gang yin pa dang / rga shi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rga shi dben pa gang yin pa dang / rga shi ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon
376a2('bum): gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de/ gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa pa'i phyir/ byang
376a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
376a4('bum): sngon gyi mthar so/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
376a5('bum): mthar so/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
376a6('bum): so/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
376a7('bum): so/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
376b1('bum): so/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
376b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
376b3('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems
376b4('bum): dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa pa gang yin pa dang /
376b5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha'
376b6('bum): gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
376b7('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
377a1('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa'i phyir/ byang
377a2('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub
377a3('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub
377a4('bum): sems dpa' dbus su so/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
377a5('bum): dpa' dbus su so/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
377a6('bum): pa pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha'
377a7('bum): dbus te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshul
377b1('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan
377b2('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims
377b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de
377b4('bum): gnyis su byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
377b5('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub
377b6('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi
377b7('bum): ma'i mthar so/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
378a1('bum): mthar so/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
378a2('bum): so/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir
378a3('bum): zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi
378a4('bum): mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus mi te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
378a5('bum): dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang
378a6('bum): gzhan ma yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin
378a7('bum): pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams
378b1('bum): cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
378b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
378b3('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
378b4('bum): so/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so//
378b5('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
378b6('bum): tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
378b7('bum): ti'i bu/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha'
379a1('bum): / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
379a2('bum): phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan
379a3('bum): ma yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /
379a4('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis
379a5('bum): su byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems
379a6('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
379a7('bum): sngon gyi mthar so/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
379b1('bum): mthar so/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
379b2('bum): so/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so//
379b3('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
379b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon
379b5('bum): gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol
379b6('bum): tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/
379b7('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
380a1('bum): tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /
380a2('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
380a3('bum): phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa'i
380a4('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
380a5('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi
380a6('bum): ma'i mthar so/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// shes
380a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
380b1('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' /
380b2('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ shes
380b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha
380b4('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo
380b5('bum): nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// //
380b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu drug pa// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// nang stong pa
380b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang
381a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / nang stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
381a2('bum): mthar so/ / nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// nang stong pa nyid
381a3('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
381a4('bum): so/ / nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid pa dang / nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / nang stong
381a5('bum): pa nyid dben pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus so// nang stong pa nyid/ pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid/
381a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid/ dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi
381a7('bum): ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na nang stong pa nyid pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa
381b1('bum): dang / nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar
381b2('bum): do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// phyi stong
381b3('bum): pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// phyi stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
381b4('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ / phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// phyi stong pa
381b5('bum): nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// phyi stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// phyi stong pa
381b6('bum): nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha
381b7('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi stong pa nyid pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dben pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ phyi stong
382a1('bum): pa nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma
382a2('bum): yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na phyi stong pa nyid pa gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa
382a3('bum): dang / phyi stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de
382a4('bum): thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi nang stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang
382a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
382a6('bum): so/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// phyi nang stong pa nyid dben
382a7('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// phyi nang stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
382b1('bum): dbus su so/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i
382b2('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi nang stong pa nyid pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
382b3('bum): pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/
382b4('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
382b5('bum): de ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid pa gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa
382b6('bum): dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/

383a5('bum): so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi
383a6('bum): mtha' mi / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ stong

383b1('bum): bu/ de ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid pa gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems
383b2('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chen po stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/

383b4('bum): so/ / chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// chen po stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi
383b5('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
383b6('bum): mthar so/ / chen po stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// chen po stong pa nyid
383b7('bum): dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chen po stong pa
384a1('bum): nyid pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dben pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ chen po stong pa
384a2('bum): nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon

384a5('bum): cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ don dam pa stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang
384a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
384a7('bum): sngon gyi mthar so/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so//
384b1('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// don dam pa stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/
384b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so//

384b5('bum): pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi
384b6('bum): ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid pa gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa
384b7('bum): nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad
385a1('bum): kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi
385a2('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mo// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
385a3('bum): sngon gyi mthar so/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar

385a5('bum): stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang

385a7('bum): nyid pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus
385b1('bum): te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub
385b2('bum): sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid pa gang yin pa dang /
385b3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang
385b4('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang / gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
385b5('bum): so/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// 'dus
385b6('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// 'dus ma byas stong pa
385b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
386a1('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir
386a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
386a3('bum): so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
386a4('bum): ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' mi / dbus te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus ma
386a5('bum): byas stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/
386a6('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa gang
386a7('bum): yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
386b1('bum): gnyis su de gnyis su byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir
386b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub
386b3('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi
386b4('bum): ma'i mthar so/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
386b5('bum): mthar so/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
386b6('bum): so/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so//
386b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong
387a1('bum): pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa
387a2('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma
387a3('bum): yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid pa gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
387a4('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /
387a5('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// thog ma dang
387a6('bum): tha ma pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// thog ma dang
387a7('bum): tha ma pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so//
387b1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// thog ma dang
387b2('bum): tha ma pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// thog ma dang tha ma
387b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong
387b4('bum): pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
387b5('bum): dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi / phyi ma'i mtha' mi / dbus te/ thog ma dang tha ma
387b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
387b7('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na thog
388a1('bum): ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid pa gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa
388a2('bum): nyid ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe
388a3('bum): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// dor ba pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sdon gyi mthar so//
388a4('bum): dor ba pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// dor ba pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// dor ba pa
388a5('bum): stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// dor ba pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// dor ba pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i
388a6('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// dor ba pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// dor ba pa stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub
388a7('bum): sems dpa' dbus su so/ / dor ba pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// dor ba pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
388b1('bum): so/ / dor ba pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid pa dang / dor ba pa stong
388b2('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid pa yang gzhan
388b3('bum): ma yin/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi
388b4('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na dor ba pa stong pa nyid pa gang yin pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang
388b5('bum): yin pa dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa
388b6('bum): dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rang bzhin stong
388b7('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i
389a1('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang
389a2('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
389a3('bum): so/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
389a4('bum): dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
389a5('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus mi te/
389a6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems
389a7('bum): dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid pa gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin
389b1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i
389b2('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
389b3('bum): so/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// chos
389b4('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// chos thams cad
389b5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo
389b6('bum): nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chu ba sems dpa' dbus su so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
389b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
390a1('bum): dpa' dbus su so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben
390a2('bum): pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chos thams cad stong
390a3('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha'
390a4('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
390a5('bum): gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi
390a6('bum): ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
390a7('bum): mthar so/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
390b1('bum): sngon gyi mthar so/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
390b2('bum): so/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so//
390b3('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rang gi mtshan nyid
390b4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
390b5('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
390b6('bum): nyid dben pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin rang gi mtshan
390b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/
391a1('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid pa gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan
391a2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /
391a3('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu pa stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
391a4('bum): so/ / pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// mi pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// pa stong
391a5('bum): pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// pa stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi
391a6('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang
391a7('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ / pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
391b1('bum): so/ / pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
391b2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ pa stong pa nyid pa dang / pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' /
391b3('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ pa stong pa nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/
391b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
391b5('bum): dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na pa stong pa nyid pa gang yin pa dang / pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / mi pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa
391b6('bum): gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang
391b7('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// dngos po pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
392a1('bum): so/ / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// dngos po pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
392a2('bum): mthar so/ / dngos po pa stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// dngos po pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so//
392a3('bum): dngos po pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// dngos po pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// dngos po pa stong
392a4('bum): pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// dngos po pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// dngos po pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang
392a5('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so/ / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid
392a6('bum): med pa dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi / phyi ma'i mtha' mi / dbus
392a7('bum): te/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
392b1('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na dngos po
392b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang
392b3('bum): chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ngo bo nyid stong pa
392b4('bum): nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang
392b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi
392b6('bum): ma'i mthar so/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// ngo bo
392b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
393a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
393a2('bum): dbus su so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa la
393a3('bum): sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus mi te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma
393a4('bum): yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan
393a5('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems
393a6('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa'i
393a7('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
393b1('bum): dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
393b2('bum): nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid
393b3('bum): stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// dngos po pa'i ngo
393b4('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
393b5('bum): nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa
393b6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
393b7('bum): pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
394a1('bum): ma yin/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi
394a2('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid
394a3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi
394a4('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// //
394a5('bum): / // // // // // //
